trans-unit.source: This is useful for registering namespaces that cannot be amended to add the macros, for example because they belong to 3rdparty libraries.

trans-unit.source: This is useful for registering types that cannot be amended to add the macros, for example because they belong to 3rdparty libraries.
trans-unit.target: 这对于注册那些不能修改以添加宏的类型很有用,例如,因为它们属于第三方库。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for registering types that cannot be amended to add the macros, for example because they belong to 3rdparty libraries. To register a namespace, see QML_FOREIGN_NAMESPACE().

trans-unit.source: This is useful for simple use-cases. Usually it is better to use recordTimestamp().
trans-unit.target: 这对于简单的用例很有用。通常最好使用recordTimestamp（）。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for things that need to provide a default value but do not start out knowing what the default should be (perhaps it depends on other fields on the form). Start the line edit without the best default, and when the default is known, if modified() returns false (the user hasn't entered any text), insert the default value.
trans-unit.target: 这对于需要提供默认值但又不知道默认值是什么的东西很有用（也许它取决于表单上的其他字段）。在没有最佳默认值的情况下开始行编辑，当默认值已知时，如果Modifyed（）返回 false （用户未输入任何文本），请插入默认值。

trans-unit.source: This is useful if the types you use as properties or signal/slots arguments are forward declared.
trans-unit.target: 如果您用作属性或信号/插槽参数的类型是正向声明的,这很有用。

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you need to upload OpenGL objects (buffers, textures, etc.) before creating or showing a QOpenGLWidget or QQuickWidget.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要在创建或显示QOpenGLWidget或QQuickWidget之前上载OpenGL对象（缓冲区，纹理等），这将很有用。

trans-unit.source: This is useful if your widget needs special behavior when dragging to itself.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的小组件在拖动到自身时需要特殊行为,这很有用。

trans-unit.source: This is useful on mobile platforms such as Android, iOS, and UWP (Universal Windows Platform); especially on iOS, where policy dictates that all web content is displayed using the operating system's web view.
trans-unit.target: 这在Android，iOS和UWP（通用Windows平台）等移动平台上很有用；特别是在iOS上，该策略规定所有Web内容均使用操作系统的Web视图显示。

trans-unit.source: This is useful on mobile platforms such as Android, iOS, and WinRT; especially on iOS, where policy dictates that all web content is displayed using the operating system's web view.

trans-unit.source: This is useful since a missing break statement is often a bug, and some compilers can be configured to emit warnings when one is not found.

trans-unit.target: 这对于从任意字符串建立模式非常方便。

trans-unit.source: This is what QUtf8StringView is expected to look like in Qt 7, but for Qt 6, this was not possible. Instead of locking users into a C++17-era interface for the next decade, Qt provides two QUtf8StringView classes, in different (inline) namespaces. The first, in namespace q_no_char8_t, has a value_type of const char and is universally available. The second, in namespace q_has_char8_t, has a value_type of const char8_t and is only available when compiling in C++20 mode.
trans-unit.target: 这就是QUtf8StringView在Qt 7中的样子，但是对于Qt 6，这是不可能的。在接下来的十年中，Qt并没有将用户锁定在C ++ 17时代的接口中，而是提供了两个QUtf8StringView类，它们位于不同的（内联）名称空间中。第一个在命名空间 q_no_char8_t 中，其value_type为 const char ，并且通用。第二个在名称空间 q_has_char8_t 中，其value_type为 const char8_t ，仅在以C ++ 20模式编译时可用。

trans-unit.source: This issue does not apply to QStrings since they represent characters using Unicode.
trans-unit.target: 这个问题不适用于QString，因为它们使用Unicode表示字符。

trans-unit.source: This item is used in arrow-key-navigation mode to highlight the navigation focus on the keyboard.

trans-unit.target: 此项用于指示文本选区的边界,并可交互式移动选区的开始或结束。同一项目用于开始和结束选择。

trans-unit.source: This item needs to be a descendant of a WaylandQuickItem or a derivative, (i.e. ShellSurfaceItem or similar)

trans-unit.source: This item will receive all mouse events for the scene until any of the following events occurs:
trans-unit.target: 此项目将接收场景的所有鼠标事件,直到以下任何一个事件发生。

trans-unit.source: This item will receive all mouse events until ungrabMouse() is called. Usually this function should not be called, since accepting for example a mouse press event makes sure that the following events are delivered to the item. If an item wants to take over mouse events from the current receiver, it needs to call this function.
trans-unit.target: 该项目将接收所有鼠标事件，直到调用ungrabMouse（）。通常不应该调用此函数，因为接受例如鼠标按下事件可确保将以下事件传递给该项目。如果某个项目想要接管当前接收者的鼠标事件，则需要调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: This key allows to specify another protocol. For now, this parameter can only be set and used in the SocketCAN plugin. This enum value was introduced in Qt 5.14.
trans-unit.target: 这个键允许指定另一个协议。目前,这个参数只能在SocketCAN插件中设置和使用。这个枚举值是在Qt 5.14中引入的。

trans-unit.source: This key can be used as a filler in the keyboard layout.
trans-unit.target: 这个键可以作为键盘布局中的填充物。

trans-unit.source: This key changes the current input language in the list of supported languages. The key has two function modes:

trans-unit.source: This key changes the shift state of the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 这个键可以改变键盘的移位状态。

trans-unit.source: This key defines the CAN FD payload bitrate in bits per second. CAN FD allows to transmit the payload of frames with QCanBusFrame::hasBitrateSwitch() flag at a higher data bitrate, after the arbitration phase at the nominal bitrate is finished. This enum value was introduced in Qt 5.9. See also QCanBusDevice::BitRateKey
trans-unit.target: 此项定义了以每秒位数为单位的CAN FD有效负载比特率。在标称比特率的仲裁阶段完成之后，CAN FD允许以更高的数据比特率传输带有QCanBusFrame :: hasBitrateSwitch（）标志的帧的有效载荷。这个枚举值在Qt 5.9中引入。另请参见 QCanBusDevice::BitRateKey

trans-unit.source: This key defines the CAN bitrate in bits per second. With CAN FD, the payload can be transmitted at a higher data bitrate, if QCanBusFrame::hasBitrateSwitch() is set. In this case, QCanBusDevice::BitRateKey is only used for the CAN ID arbitration phase. See also QCanBusDevice::DataBitRateKey
trans-unit.target: 此项定义了以位/秒为单位的CAN比特率。如果设置了QCanBusFrame :: hasBitrateSwitch（），则使用CAN FD可以以更高的数据比特率传输有效载荷。在这种情况下， QCanBusDevice::BitRateKey 仅用于CAN ID仲裁阶段。另请参见 QCanBusDevice::DataBitRateKey

trans-unit.source: This key defines the range where custom keys start. Its most common purpose is to permit platform-specific configuration options.
trans-unit.target: 这个键定义了自定义键开始的范围。它最常见的目的是允许特定平台的配置选项。

trans-unit.source: This key defines the type of error that should be forwarded via the current connection. The associated value should be of type QCanBusFrame::FrameErrors.
trans-unit.target: 此项定义了应通过当前连接转发的错误类型。关联的值应为QCanBusFrame :: FrameErrors类型。

trans-unit.source: This key defines whether sending and receiving of CAN FD frames should be enabled. The expected value for this key is bool.
trans-unit.target: 此项定义是否应启用CAN FD帧的发送和接收。此密钥的期望值为 bool 。

trans-unit.source: This key defines whether the CAN bus device should operate in loopback mode. Loopback means, whenever a CAN frame is transmitted on the CAN bus, a local echo of this frame is sent to all applications connected to this CAN device. The expected value for this key is bool.
trans-unit.target: 此项定义CAN总线设备是否应在环回模式下运行。环回意味着，每当在CAN总线上传输CAN帧时，该帧的本地回显都会发送到连接到该CAN设备的所有应用程序。此密钥的期望值为 bool 。

trans-unit.source: This key defines whether this CAN device receives its own send frames. This can be used to check if the transmission was successful. The expected value for this key is bool.
trans-unit.target: 该密钥定义此CAN设备是否接收自己的发送帧。这可用于检查传输是否成功。此密钥的期望值为 bool 。

trans-unit.source: This level has been introduced in Windows Vista. Windows will pretend to the application that it is running on a standard display of 96 DPI of 1920x1080 and scale the application accordingly. It is intended to accommodate older applications designed for low DPI displays. Some artifacts may result from this type of scaling.

trans-unit.source: This level was introduced in Windows Vista. To the application, Windows pretends as if it's running on a standard display of 96 DPI of 1920x1080 and scales the application accordingly. It's intended to accommodate older applications designed for low DPI displays. This type of scaling may result in some artifacts.

trans-unit.source: This limitation only applies when there are other widgets underneath the QQuickWidget inside the same window. Making the window semi-transparent, with other applications and the desktop visible in the background, is done in the traditional way: Set Qt::WA_TranslucentBackground on the top-level window, request an alpha channel, and change the Qt Quick Scenegraph's clear color to Qt::transparent via setClearColor().
trans-unit.target: 仅当同一窗口内QQuickWidget下方还有其他小部件时，此限制才适用。使窗口半透明，使其他应用程序和桌面在后台可见，是通过传统方式完成的：在顶级窗口上设置Qt :: WA_TranslucentBackground，请求Alpha通道，并更改Qt Quick Scenegraph的透明颜色通过setClearColor（）转换为Qt :: transparent。

trans-unit.source: This limitation only applies when there are other widgets underneath the QQuickWidget inside the same window. Making the window semi-transparent, with other applications and the desktop visible in the background, is done in the traditional way: Set Qt::WA_TranslucentBackground on the top-level window, request an alpha channel, and change the Qt Quick Scenegraph's clear color to Qt::transparent via setClearColor().
trans-unit.target: 仅当同一窗口中QQuickWidget下方还有其他小部件时，此限制才适用。使窗口半透明，使其他应用程序和桌面在后台可见，这是通过传统方式完成的：在顶级窗口上设置Qt :: WA_TranslucentBackground，请求Alpha通道，并更改Qt Quick Scenegraph的透明颜色通过setClearColor（）转换为Qt :: transparent。

trans-unit.source: This list gives an indication of which features to safely use in an application where performance is critical. For certain setups, other operations may be fast too, but before making extensive use of them, it is recommended to benchmark and verify them on the system where the software will run in the end. There are also cases where expensive operations are ok to use, for instance when the result is cached in a QPixmap.
trans-unit.target: 该列表指示了在性能至关重要的应用程序中可以安全使用哪些功能。对于某些设置，其他操作也可能很快，但是在广泛使用它们之前，建议在最终将运行软件的系统上进行基准测试和验证。在某些情况下，也可以使用昂贵的操作，例如，将结果缓存在QPixmap中。

trans-unit.source: This list of services accumulates newly discovered services from multiple calls to start(). Unless clear() is called the list cannot decrease in size. This implies that if a remote Bluetooth device moves out of range in between two subsequent calls to start() the list may contain stale entries.
trans-unit.target: 该服务列表从对start（）的多个调用中累积了新发现的服务。除非调用clear（），否则列表的大小不能减小。这意味着，如果远程蓝牙设备在两次随后的开始（）调用之间移出范围，则该列表可能包含陈旧的条目。

trans-unit.source: This list will include both long an short name options that were not recognized. For any long options that were in the form {--option=value}, the value part will have been dropped and only the long name is added.
trans-unit.target: 这个列表将包括未被识别的长名和短名选项。对于任何形式为{--option=value}的长选项,值部分将被删除,只添加长名。

trans-unit.source: This locale is based on en_US but with various quirks of its own, such as simplified number formatting and its own date formatting. It implements the POSIX standards that describe the behavior of standard library functions of the "C" programming language.
trans-unit.target: 这个语言是以en_US为基础的,但也有自己的一些特点,比如简化的数字格式和自己的日期格式。它实现了描述 "C "编程语言标准库函数行为的POSIX标准。

trans-unit.source: This macro can be defined in the project file to disable functions deprecated in a specified version of Qt or any earlier version. The default version number is 5.0, meaning that functions deprecated in or before Qt 5.0 will not be included.
trans-unit.target: 这个宏可以在项目文件中定义,以禁用在指定的Qt版本或任何早期版本中废弃的功能。默认的版本号是5.0,这意味着在Qt 5.0或更早的版本中被废弃的功能将不会被包含。

trans-unit.source: This macro can be used to declare an inline function that can be computed at compile-time according to the relaxed rules from C++14.
trans-unit.target: 这个宏可以用来声明一个内联函数,这个内联函数可以在编译时根据C++14的放宽规则进行计算。

trans-unit.source: This macro can be used to declare an overriding virtual function. Use of this markup will allow the compiler to generate an error if the overriding virtual function does not in fact override anything.
trans-unit.target: 这个宏可以用来声明一个覆盖的虚拟函数。如果覆盖的虚拟函数实际上没有覆盖任何东西,使用这个标记将允许编译器产生一个错误。

trans-unit.source: This macro can be used to declare an overriding virtual or a class as "final", with Java semantics. Further-derived classes can then no longer override this virtual function, or inherit from this class, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 这个宏可以用来声明一个覆盖的虚拟函数或一个类为 "final",具有Java语义。然后,进一步派生的类就不能再分别覆盖这个虚拟函数,或从这个类继承。

trans-unit.source: This macro can be used to declare variable that should be constructed at compile-time, or an inline function that can be computed at compile-time.
trans-unit.target: 这个宏可以用来声明应该在编译时构造的变量,或者可以在编译时计算的内联函数。

trans-unit.source: This macro can be used to determine the byte order your system uses for storing data in memory. i.e., whether your system is little-endian or big-endian. It is set by Qt to one of the macros Q_LITTLE_ENDIAN or Q_BIG_ENDIAN. You normally won't need to worry about endian-ness, but you might, for example if you need to know which byte of an integer or UTF-16 character is stored in the lowest address. Endian-ness is important in networking, where computers with different values for Q_BYTE_ORDER must pass data back and forth.
trans-unit.target: 该宏可用于确定系统用于在内存中存储数据的字节顺序。即，您的系统是小端还是大端。Qt将其设置为宏Q_LITTLE_ENDIAN或Q_BIG_ENDIAN之一。通常，您无需担心字节序，但是，例如，如果您需要知道整数或UTF-16字符的哪个字节存储在最低地址中，则可能会担心。字节序在网络中很重要，在网络中，具有不同Q_BYTE_ORDER值的计算机必须来回传递数据。

trans-unit.source: This macro can be used to ensure that the application is run against a recent enough version of Qt. This is especially useful if your application depends on a specific bug fix introduced in a bug-fix release (e.g., 4.0.2).
trans-unit.target: 这个宏可以用来确保应用程序是在Qt的最新版本下运行。如果你的应用程序依赖于在错误修复版本中引入的特定错误修复(例如 4.0.2),那么这个宏就特别有用。

trans-unit.target: 此宏可用于通过隐式声明的QAxFactory实现导出多个QObject类。所有QObject类都必须通过Q_CLASSINFO（）宏声明ClassID，InterfaceID和EventsID（如果适用）。所有声明都将在具有ID的类型库中

trans-unit.source: This macro could be considered a "lighter" version of Q_ASSERT(). While Q_ASSERT will abort the program's execution if the condition is false, Q_ASSUME will tell the compiler not to generate code for those conditions. Therefore, it is important that the assumptions always hold, otherwise undefined behaviour may occur.
trans-unit.target: 可以将此宏视为Q_ASSERT（）的“较轻”版本。如果条件为 false ，虽然Q_ASSERT将中止程序的执行，但Q_ASSUME将告诉编译器不要为这些条件生成代码。因此，重要的是假设必须始终成立，否则可能会发生不确定的行为。

trans-unit.source: This macro defines the behavior of the list properties of this class to Append. When assigning the property in a derived type, the values are appended to those of the base class. This is the default behavior.

trans-unit.source: This macro defines the behavior of the list properties of this class to ReplaceIfNotDefault. When assigning the property in a derived type, the values replace those of the base class unless it's the default property. In the case of the default property, values are appended to those of the base class.
trans-unit.target: 这个宏定义了该类的列表属性的行为为ReplaceIfNotDefault。当在派生类型中分配该属性时,除非是默认属性,否则其值会替换基类的值。在缺省属性的情况下,值会附加到基类的值。

trans-unit.source: This makes it easy to center a popup in the window from any component.

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible for sibling widgets to handle touch events independently while making sure that the sequence of QTouchEvents is always correct.

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible to run most GLSL/ES shader programs on desktop systems. The programmer should restrict themselves to just features that are present in GLSL/ES, and avoid standard variable names that only work on the desktop.
trans-unit.target: 这使得在桌面系统上运行大多数GLSL/ES着色器程序成为可能。程序员应该限制自己只使用GLSL/ES中存在的功能,避免使用只在桌面系统上工作的标准变量名。

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible to specify shared libraries that are only identified by their basename (i.e. without their suffix), so the same code will work on different operating systems yet still minimise the number of attempts to find the library.
trans-unit.target: 这使得指定共享库成为可能,这些共享库只通过其基名来识别(即没有后缀),因此相同的代码将在不同的操作系统上工作,但仍然可以最大限度地减少查找库的尝试次数。

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible to, for example, run a batch of jobs with an event loop and exit that event loop after the last job is finished. That is accomplished by keeping a QEventLoopLocker with each job instance.
trans-unit.target: 例如，这使得可以使用事件循环运行一批作业，并在最后一个作业完成后退出该事件循环。这可以通过在每个作业实例中保留一个QEventLoopLocker来实现。

trans-unit.source: This makes sure that whenever qt.index is used to generate references to for example Qt classes, the base URL is http://doc.qt.io/qt-4.8/.

trans-unit.source: This means that all QOpenGLWidgets in the same window can access each other's sharable resources, like textures, and there is no need for an extra "global share" context.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着同一窗口中的所有QOpenGLWidgets都可以访问彼此的可共享资源（例如纹理），并且不需要额外的“全局共享”上下文。

trans-unit.source: This means that all QOpenGLWidgets in the same window can access each other's sharable resources, like textures, and there is no need for an extra "global share" context, as was the case with QGLWidget.

trans-unit.source: This means that each instance of QXmlName is tied to the name pool it was created with, and that name pool should be kept in scope and used to create all instances of QXmlName that might be compared. Note also that the name pool is required if you must reconstitute the QXmlName as text, or if you must access any of its component strings, so although instances of QXmlName can be compared without reference to a name pool, the name pool must be kept in scope if the name's strings must be accessed later.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着QXmlName的每个实例都与其创建时使用的名称池相关联，并且该名称池应保留在范围内，并用于创建可以比较的QXmlName的所有实例。还要注意，如果必须将QXmlName重新构造为文本，或者必须访问其任何组成字符串，则必须使用名称池，因此尽管可以在不引用名称池的情况下比较QXmlName的实例，但名称池必须保留在如果必须稍后访问该名称的字符串，则为范围。

trans-unit.source: This means that for all x values before the first character this function returns 0, and for all x values after the last character this function returns text.length. If the y value is above the text the position will be that of the nearest character on the first line and if it is below the text the position of the nearest character on the last line will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着对于第一个字符之前的所有x值,函数返回0,对于最后一个字符之后的所有x值,函数返回text.length。如果y值高于文本,则返回第一行最接近的字符的位置,如果低于文本,则返回最后一行最接近的字符的位置。

trans-unit.source: This means that when logging in synchronous mode you will be able to run your OpenGL application in a debugger, put a breakpoint on a slot connected to the messageLogged() signal, and see in the backtrace the exact call that caused the logged message. This can be extremely useful to debug an OpenGL problem. Note that if OpenGL rendering is happening in another thread, you must force the signal/slot connection type to Qt::DirectConnection in order to be able to see the actual backtrace.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着在同步模式下登录时，您将能够在调试器中运行OpenGL应用程序，在连接到messageLogged（）信号的插槽上放置一个断点，并在backtrace中查看导致记录消息的确切调用。这对于调试OpenGL问题可能非常有用。请注意，如果在另一个线程中进行OpenGL渲染，则必须将信号/插槽连接类型强制为Qt :: DirectConnection，以便能够看到实际的回溯。

trans-unit.source: This means that you must handle event propagation, animation timing, and node lifetime yourself.

trans-unit.source: This means to give the window a default visible state, which might be fullscreen or windowed depending on the platform. It can be given as a parameter to setVisibility but will never be read back from the visibility accessor.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着为窗口提供默认的可见状态，根据平台的不同，该状态可以是全屏显示或窗口显示。可以将其作为setVisibility的参数来提供，但永远不会从可见性访问器中读取。

trans-unit.source: This means, it's up to the compositor to decide what a multi-process system is. For instance, the clients could be part of a 3D scene with windows on the walls, on a VR system, mapped to a sphere, and so on.

trans-unit.source: This mechanism is free for you to use in your Qt applications. Qt doesn't use it for any of its classes.
trans-unit.target: 这个机制是免费的,你可以在你的Qt应用程序中使用。Qt的任何类都不使用它。

trans-unit.source: This mechanism is useful when you want to use the same delegate for a number of views, for example, but you want decorations or other features to be different for each view, and you would like these different settings to be properties of each of the views. Similarly, it might be of interest to access or show some properties of the model.
trans-unit.target: 例如,当您想为多个视图使用同一个委托,但您希望每个视图的装饰或其他功能不同,并且希望这些不同的设置成为每个视图的属性时,这种机制就很有用。类似地,可能对访问或显示模型的一些属性感兴趣。

trans-unit.source: This mechanism makes it possible for a specific translation to be "selected" or given priority over the others; simply uninstall the translator from the application by passing it to the QCoreApplication::removeTranslator() function and reinstall it with QCoreApplication::installTranslator(). It will then be the first translation to be searched for matching strings.
trans-unit.target: 这种机制使“翻译”的选择或相对于其他翻译的优先级成为可能。只需将翻译器传递到QCoreApplication :: removeTranslator（）函数即可从应用程序中将其卸载，然后使用QCoreApplication :: installTranslator（）重新安装它。然后它将是第一个要搜索匹配字符串的翻译。

trans-unit.source: This member is always empty for IPv6 addresses, since the concept of broadcast has been abandoned in that system in favor of multicast. In particular, the group of hosts corresponding to all the nodes in the local network can be reached by the "all-nodes" special multicast group (address FF02::1).
trans-unit.target: 对于IPv6地址来说,这个成员总是空的,因为在该系统中已经放弃了广播的概念,而采用了组播。特别是 "all-nodes "特殊多播组(地址FF02::1)可以到达本地网络中所有节点对应的主机组。

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect when direct write fallback is used. This is the case when saving over an existing file in a readonly directory: no temporary file can be created, so the existing file is overwritten no matter what, and cancelWriting() cannot do anything about that, the contents of the existing file will be lost.
trans-unit.target: 当使用直接写回退时,这个方法没有效果。当保存在一个只读目录下的现有文件时,就会出现这种情况:不能创建临时文件,所以无论如何都会覆盖现有的文件,而cancelWriting()也不能做任何事情,现有文件的内容会丢失。

trans-unit.source: This method is called at most once by the engine for each attachee object instance, as the engine caches the returned instance pointer for subsequent attached property accesses. Consequently the attachment object may not be deleted until the attachee object is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 引擎为每个附加对象实例最多调用一次此方法，因为引擎会缓存返回的实例指针以用于后续的附加属性访问。因此，直到attachee安装对象可以不删除 object 将被破坏。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by input engine when the input method is being activated and every time the input method hints are updated. The input method can reserve selection lists by returning the desired selection list types.
trans-unit.target: 当输入法被激活以及每次更新输入法提示时,输入引擎都会调用该方法。输入法可以通过返回所需的选择列表类型来保留选择列表。

trans-unit.target: 该方法被输入引擎调用来查询支持的模式识别模式列表。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the input engine when the input method needs to be reset. The input method must reset its internal state only. The main difference to the update() method is that reset() modifies only the input method state, i.e. it must not modify the input context.
trans-unit.target: 需要重置输入法时，输入引擎会调用此方法。输入法只能重置其内部状态。与update（）方法的主要区别在于reset（）仅修改输入方法的状态，即它不得修改输入上下文。

trans-unit.source: This method is the C++ counterpart of a throw() expression in JavaScript. It enables C++ code to report run-time errors to QJSEngine. Therefore it should only be called from C++ code that was invoked by a JavaScript function through QJSEngine.

trans-unit.source: This method is tied to the Registry and External Schemas. By registering a std::function handler for an external schema, the registered method will be called when the registry is notified of a Source you've acquired being available. Without this registration, QtRO would only be able to handle the "built-in" schemas.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与注册表和外部架构相关联。通过为外部模式注册std :: function处理程序，当注册中心被通知您获取的Source可用时，将调用已注册的方法。没有此注册，QtRO将只能处理“内置”模式。

trans-unit.source: This method issues an asynchronous request for printing the web page into a PDF and returns immediately. To be informed about the result of the request, connect to the signal pdfPrintingFinished().

trans-unit.source: This method looks at both the file name and the file contents, if necessary. The file extension has priority over the contents, but the contents will be used if the file extension is unknown, or matches multiple MIME types.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要的话,这个方法既看文件名,也看文件内容,文件扩展名优先于内容,但如果文件扩展名未知,或者符合多种MIME类型,则会使用内容。文件扩展名优先于内容,但如果文件扩展名未知,或与多种MIME类型相匹配,将使用内容。

trans-unit.source: This mode is best explained with an example. When the ListView type is first created, it needs to populate itself with an initial set of delegates to show. If the ListView was 400 pixels high, and each delegate was 100 pixels high, it would need to create four initial delegate instances. If the ListView used the Asynchronous incubation mode, the ListView would always be created empty and then, sometime later, the four initial items would appear.
trans-unit.target: 最好用一个示例来说明此模式。当ListView中首次创建类型，它需要一组初始代表展示的填充本身。如果ListView的高度为400像素，并且每个委托的高度为100像素，则需要创建四个初始委托实例。如果ListView使用异步孵化模式，则ListView始终将创建为空，然后在某个时间之后，将出现四个初始项。

trans-unit.source: This mode is quite useful when portions of a URL are used in a non-URL context. For example, to extract the username, password or file paths in an FTP client application, the FullyDecoded mode should be used.

trans-unit.source: This module also provides the QtConcurrent::run() function, which can run any function in another thread. However, QtConcurrent::run() only supports a subset of features available to the map, filter and reduce functions. The QFuture can be used to retrieve the function's return value and to check if the thread is running. However, a call to QtConcurrent::run() uses one thread only, cannot be paused/resumed/canceled, and cannot be queried for progress.
trans-unit.target: 该模块还提供了QtConcurrent :: run（）函数，该函数可以在另一个线程中运行任何函数。但是，QtConcurrent :: run（）仅支持可用于地图，过滤和归约功能的功能子集。该QFuture可用于获取函数的返回值和检查，如果线程运行。但是，对QtConcurrent :: run（）的调用仅使用一个线程，不能暂停/继续/取消，也不能查询其进度。

trans-unit.source: This module also provides the QtConcurrent::run() function, which can run any function in another thread. However, QtConcurrent::run() only supports a subset of features available to the map, filter and reduce functions. The QFuture can be used to retrieve the function's return value and to check if the thread is running. However, a call to QtConcurrent::run() uses one thread only, cannot be paused/resumed/canceled, and cannot be queried for progress.
trans-unit.target: 该模块还提供了QtConcurrent :: run（）函数，该函数可以在另一个线程中运行任何函数。但是，QtConcurrent :: run（）仅支持可用于地图，过滤和归约功能的功能子集。该QFuture可用于获取函数的返回值和检查，如果线程运行。但是，对QtConcurrent :: run（）的调用仅使用一个线程，不能暂停/继续/取消，也不能查询其进度。

trans-unit.source: This number is usually arbitrary for all clocks except the QElapsedTimer::SystemTime clock. For that clock type, this number is the number of milliseconds since January 1st, 1970 at 0:00 UTC (that is, it is the Unix time expressed in milliseconds).
trans-unit.target: 对于除QElapsedTimer :: SystemTime时钟以外的所有时钟，此数字通常是任意的。对于该时钟类型，此数字是自1970年1月1日UTC 0:00以来的毫秒数（即，以Unix表示的Unix时间）。

trans-unit.source: This number represents the color variation applied to individual particles. Setting colorVariation is the same as setting redVariation, greenVariation, and blueVariation to the same number.
trans-unit.target: 该数字表示应用于单个粒子的颜色变化。设置colorVariation与将redVariation，greenVariation和blueVariation设置为相同的数字相同。

trans-unit.source: This object can be used to place an additional copyright notices programmatically.

trans-unit.source: This object contains no data after a call to this function if the object was constructed without a device to read data from or if this function was not able to get more data from the device.
trans-unit.target: 如果该对象在构建时没有设备读取数据,或者该函数无法从设备中获取更多的数据,那么在调用该函数后,该对象不包含任何数据。

trans-unit.source: This object uses RenderControl to render the given Item into an offscreen surface, which is attached to a texture provided by the user. This allows the component to directly render into the texture without intermediate copy and the user to freely specify how the texture is used in the 3D scene.
trans-unit.target: 该对象使用RenderControl将给定的Item渲染到屏幕外的表面,该表面附着在用户提供的贴图上。这样组件就可以直接渲染到贴图中,而不需要中间拷贝,用户可以自由指定在3D场景中如何使用贴图。

trans-unit.source: This one allocates the correct amount of space:

trans-unit.source: This one uses the empty() and function to test whether the method contains any steps. If the method contains no steps, then empty(step) will return true, and hence the predicate will evaluate to true.
trans-unit.target: 此函数使用empty（）和函数测试该方法是否包含任何步骤。如果该方法不包含任何步骤，则 empty(step) 将返回 true ，因此谓词将评估为 true 。

trans-unit.source: This only affects the very first animation played. Transitioning to another animation, or the same animation again, will not trigger this.

trans-unit.source: This operation can be slow for large

trans-unit.source: This operation is fast thanks to implicit sharing.
trans-unit.target: 由于隐式共享，此操作很快。

trans-unit.source: This operation is relatively fast, because QList typically allocates more memory than necessary, so it can grow without reallocating the entire list each time.
trans-unit.target: 此操作相对较快，因为QList通常会分配比必要数量更多的内存，因此它可以增长而不必每次都重新分配整个列表。

trans-unit.source: This operation is relatively fast, because QVector typically allocates more memory than necessary, so it can grow without reallocating the entire vector each time.
trans-unit.target: 此操作相对较快，因为QVector通常会分配比必要数量更多的内存，因此它可以增长而不必每次都重新分配整个向量。

trans-unit.source: This operation is typically very fast (constant time), because QByteArray preallocates extra space at the beginning of the data, so it can grow without reallocating the entire array each time.
trans-unit.target: 此操作通常非常快（恒定时间），因为QByteArray在数据的开头预先分配了额外的空间，因此它可以增长而不必每次都重新分配整个数组。

trans-unit.source: This operation is typically very fast (constant time), because QString preallocates extra space at the end of the string data so it can grow without reallocating the entire string each time.
trans-unit.target: 此操作通常非常快（恒定时间），因为QString在字符串数据的末尾预分配了额外的空间，因此它可以增长而不必每次都重新分配整个字符串。

trans-unit.source: This operation is very fast and never fails.
trans-unit.target: 这种操作速度非常快,从来没有失败过。

trans-unit.source: This operation occurs in constant time, because QHash is implicitly shared. This makes returning a QHash from a function very fast. If a shared instance is modified, it will be copied (copy-on-write), and this takes linear time.
trans-unit.target: 因为QHash是隐式共享的，所以此操作在固定时间内进行。这使得从函数快速返回QHash。如果共享实例被修改，它将被复制（写时复制），这需要线性时间。

trans-unit.source: This option enables qmake to track these dependencies. When this option is enabled, qmake will create a file with the extension .prl which will save meta-information about the library (see Library Dependencies for more info).

trans-unit.source: This option is set by default. If debug_and_release is also set, the debug and release builds end up in separate debug and release directories.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下设置此选项。如果还设置了 debug_and_release ，则调试和发布版本最终会位于单独的调试和发布目录中。

trans-unit.source: This option is useful if the data is only read at certain points in time (for instance in a real-time streaming application) or if the serial port should be protected against receiving too much data, which may eventually cause the application to run out of memory.
trans-unit.target: 如果只在某些时间点读取数据(例如在实时流媒体应用程序中),或者如果应该保护串行端口,防止接收过多的数据,最终可能导致应用程序耗尽内存,那么这个选项就很有用。

trans-unit.source: This option is useful if you only read the data at certain points in time (e.g., in a real-time streaming application) or if you want to protect your socket against receiving too much data, which may eventually cause your application to run out of memory.

trans-unit.source: This option makes fromUserInput() always return a local path unless the input contains a scheme, such as http://file.pl. This is useful for applications such as text editors, which are able to create the file if it doesn't exist.
trans-unit.target: 该选项使fromUserInput（）始终返回本地路径，除非输入包含方案，例如 http://file.pl 。这对于诸如文本编辑器之类的应用程序很有用，这些应用程序可以创建不存在的文件。

trans-unit.source: This option represents the default behavior, with group separators, with one leading zero in single digit exponents, and without trailing zeroes after the decimal dot.

trans-unit.source: This page describes how we do Physically based rendering (PBR) in Qt Quick 3D, with a focus on how to use it in your application. PBR is a way of rendering objects with more realistic looking materials by approximating the properties of the physical world. The focus of PBR is on mimicing how physical light interacts with different surfaces and materials. Aside from looking better, it also simplifies the workflow of artist since materials are based on physical parameters, which are more intuitive to use and tweak. Another benefit is that using PBR materials makes the look of imported assets more consistent with how they were designed. If you are interested in the theory behind PBR, see https://learnopengl.com/PBR/Theory and https://academy.substance3d.com/courses/the-pbr-guide-part-1 for an in-depth explanation.
trans-unit.target: 本页描述我们如何在Qt Quick 3D中进行基于物理的渲染（PBR），重点介绍如何在您的应用程序中使用它。PBR是一种通过逼近物理世界的属性来渲染具有逼真的外观的对象的方法。PBR的重点是模仿物理光如何与不同的表面和材料相互作用。除了看起来更好之外，它还简化了艺术家的工作流程，因为材料是基于物理参数的，物理参数的使用和调整更加直观。另一个好处是，使用PBR材料可使进口资产的外观与设计方式更加一致。如果您对PBR背后的理论感兴趣，请参阅https://learnopengl.com/PBR/Theory和https://academy.substance3d.com/courses/the-pbr-guide-part-1 进行深入的解释。

trans-unit.source: This parameter allows to provide a hint how tile prefetching is to be performed by the engine. The default value, TwoNeighbourLayers, makes the engine prefetch tiles for the layer above and the one below the current tile layer, providing ready tiles when zooming in or out from the current zoom level. OneNeighbourLayer only prefetches the one layer closest to the current zoom level. Finally, NoPrefetching allows to disable the prefetching, so only tiles that are visible will be fetched. Note that, depending on the active map type, this hint might be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 该参数允许提供提示，说明引擎将如何执行图块预取。默认值为 TwoNeighbourLayers ，使引擎预取当前图块层上方和下一层的图块，在放大或缩小当前缩放级别时提供就绪图块。 OneNeighbourLayer 仅预取最接近当前缩放级别的一层。最后， NoPrefetching 允许禁用预取，因此将仅读取可见的图块。请注意，根据活动的地图类型，此提示可能会被忽略。

trans-unit.source: This plugin differs from the Mapbox plugin because it uses the Mapbox GL map engine for rendering both raster tiles and vector tiles in real-time. The benefits are: text staying upright, font antialiasing, labels flowing between zoom levels, smooth pan, tilt, rotation and continuous zoom.

trans-unit.source: This pointer will remain valid until the underlying storage is detached. In particular, if you obtain a pointer, and then copy this audio buffer, changing data through this pointer may change both buffer instances. Calling data() on either instance will again cause a deep copy to be made, which may invalidate the pointers returned from this function previously.
trans-unit.target: 该指针将保持有效，直到分离了基础存储。特别是，如果您获得一个指针，然后复制此音频缓冲区，则通过该指针更改数据可能会更改两个缓冲区实例。在任何一个实例上调用data（）都会再次导致进行深层复制，这可能会使以前从该函数返回的指针无效。

trans-unit.source: This property allows the effect output pixels to be cached in order to improve the rendering performance. Every time the source or effect properties are changed, the pixels in the cache must be updated. Memory consumption is increased, because an extra buffer of memory is required for storing the effect output.
trans-unit.target: 此属性允许缓存效果输出像素,以提高渲染性能。每次改变源或效果属性时,缓存中的像素必须更新。由于需要额外的内存缓冲区来存储效果输出,因此内存消耗会增加。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to enable and disable auto orientation of the video stream, so that its orientation always matches the orientation of the screen. If autoOrientation is enabled, the orientation property is overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使您可以启用和禁用视频流的自动方向，以便其方向始终与屏幕的方向匹配。如果启用了 autoOrientation ，则将覆盖 orientation 属性。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to read the station Id of the currently tuned radio station.
trans-unit.target: 此属性允许你读取当前调谐的电台的电台ID。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to specify the alignment of an item within the cell(s) it occupies.
trans-unit.target: 此属性允许您指定项目在其占用的单元格内的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to specify the column position of an item in a GridLayout.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使您可以指定GridLayout中项目的列位置。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to specify the column span of an item in a GridLayout.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使您可以指定GridLayout中项目的列跨度。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to specify the row position of an item in a GridLayout.
trans-unit.target: 此属性允许您指定GridLayout中项目的行位置。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to specify the row span of an item in a GridLayout.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使您可以指定GridLayout中项目的行跨度。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to specify whether the radio should try and tune to alternative frequencies if the signal strength of the current station becomes too weak. The alternative frequencies are emitted over RDS by the radio station, and the tuning happens automatically.
trans-unit.target: 此属性允许你指定当当前电台的信号强度太弱时,电台是否应该尝试并调谐到其他频率。该属性允许你指定当当前电台的信号强度太弱时,电台是否应该尝试并调整到替代频率,替代频率由电台通过 RDS 发射,并自动进行调整。

trans-unit.source: This property and syncView can be used to make two tableViews synchronize with each other smoothly in flicking regardless of the different overshoot/undershoot, velocity, acceleration/deceleration or rebound animation, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 此属性和syncView可用于使两个tableView在滑动时彼此平滑地同步，而与不同的过冲/下冲，速度，加速/减速或回弹动画等无关。

trans-unit.source: This property attaches a button to a button group.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将按钮连接到按钮组。

trans-unit.source: This property attaches a horizontal scroll bar to a Flickable.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将水平滚动条附加到Flickable。

trans-unit.source: This property attaches a horizontal scroll indicator to a Flickable.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将水平滚动指示器附加到Flickable。

trans-unit.source: This property attaches a text area to a Flickable.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将文本区域附加到Flickable。

trans-unit.source: This property attaches a vertical scroll bar to a Flickable.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将垂直滚动条附加到Flickable。

trans-unit.source: This property attaches a vertical scroll indicator to a Flickable.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将垂直滚动指示器附加到Flickable。

trans-unit.source: This property attaches an action to an action group.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将一个动作附加到一个动作组。

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to refer to .sci files, which are written in a QML-specific, text-based format that specifies the borders, the image file and the tile rules for a given border image.
trans-unit.target: 此属性也可用于引用.sci文件,它是以QML特定的、基于文本的格式编写的,它为给定的边框图像指定了边框、图像文件和瓷砖规则。

trans-unit.source: This property can be attached to a non-interactive item declared in swipe.left, swipe.right, or swipe.behind, in order to detect if it is pressed. Items can only be pressed when swipe.complete is true.
trans-unit.target: 可以将此属性附加到在 swipe.left ， swipe.right 或 swipe.behind 中声明的非交互式项目中，以检测是否按下了该属性。仅当 swipe.complete 为 true 时才能按下项目。

trans-unit.source: This property can be cleared to reload the entire image by setting sourceClipRect to undefined.
trans-unit.target: 通过将 sourceClipRect 设置为 undefined ,可以清除此属性以重新加载整个图像。

trans-unit.source: This property can be faster than querying the length of the text property as it doesn't require any copying or conversion of the TextField's internal string data.
trans-unit.target: 此属性比查询text属性的长度更快，因为它不需要对TextField的内部字符串数据进行任何复制或转换。

trans-unit.source: This property can be faster than querying the length the text property as it doesn't require any copying or conversion of the TextArea's internal string data.
trans-unit.target: 该属性比查询text属性的长度要快，因为它不需要复制或转换TextArea的内部字符串数据。

trans-unit.source: This property can be faster than querying the length the text property as it doesn't require any copying or conversion of the TextEdit's internal string data.
trans-unit.target: 该属性比查询text属性的长度要快，因为它不需要对TextEdit的内部字符串数据进行任何复制或转换。

trans-unit.source: This property can be faster than querying the length the text property as it doesn't require any copying or conversion of the TextInput's internal string data.
trans-unit.target: 该属性比查询text属性的长度更快，因为它不需要对TextInput的内部字符串数据进行任何复制或转换。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set before the dialog is visible, to set the default name filter, and can also be set while the dialog is visible to set the current name filter. It is also updated when the user selects a different filter.
trans-unit.target: 该属性可以在对话框可见之前设置,以设置默认的名称过滤器,也可以在对话框可见时设置,以设置当前的名称过滤器。当用户选择不同的过滤器时,也会更新该属性。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to a string, or a list of strings. If the value is a string, the alternative keys are presented as individual characters of that string. If the value is a list of strings, the list is used instead.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可设置为字符串或字符串列表。如果值是字符串,则备选键作为该字符串的单个字符显示。如果值是字符串列表,则使用列表。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to any of the supported data models:
trans-unit.target: 可以将此属性设置为任何受支持的数据模型：

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to any valid QTime value. By default, this property contains a time of 00:00:00 and 0 milliseconds. This default can be restored with clearMinimumTime().
trans-unit.target: 可以将此属性设置为任何有效的QTime值。默认情况下，此属性包含一个时间00:00:00和0毫秒。可以使用clearMinimumTime（）恢复此默认值。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to any valid QTime value. By default, this property contains a time of 23:59:59 and 999 milliseconds. This default can be restored with clearMaximumTime().
trans-unit.target: 可以将此属性设置为任何有效的QTime值。默认情况下，此属性包含23:59:59和999毫秒的时间。可以使用clearMaximumTime（）恢复此默认值。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to change the active map type. See the supportedMapTypes property for possible values.
trans-unit.target: 可以设置此属性以更改活动地图类型。请参阅supportedMapTypes属性以获取可能的值。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to indicate how the action should be prioritized in the user interface.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可被设置为指示操作在用户界面中的优先级。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to activate or deactivate the sensor gesture. Default value is false;
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于激活或停用传感器手势。默认值为假。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to define custom behaviors based on the name or the object of the property being controlled.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于根据被控制属性的名称或对象来定义自定义行为。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to describe if and how the original value should be restored when the binding is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于描述当绑定被禁用时是否以及如何恢复原始值。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to determine all available gestures on the system.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于确定系统上所有可用的手势。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to distinguish between different types of canvases. For example, in full screen handwriting mode this property is set to "fullscreen", and in keyboard handwriting mode this property is set to "keyboard".
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于区分不同类型的画布。例如，在全屏手写模式下，此属性设置为 "fullscreen" ，在键盘手写模式下，此属性设置为 "keyboard" 。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to distinguish between different types of canvases. The default value is "keyboard".
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于区分不同类型的画布。默认值为 "keyboard" 。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to introduce uniform transparency to the volume. If preserveOpacity is true, only texels with at least some transparency to begin with are affected, and fully opaque texels are not affected. The value must not be negative. Defaults to 1.0f.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于为体积引入均匀的透明度。如果preserveOpacity为 true ，则仅影响至少具有一些透明度的纹素，而完全不透明的纹素不受影响。该值不能为负。默认为 1.0f 。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to query the selected element type. The type is valid until a new selection is made in the graph and the selectedElementChanged signal is emitted.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于查询选定的元素类型。该类型有效，直到在图形中做出新选择并发出 selectedElementChanged 信号为止。

trans-unit.source: This property can hold a function that returns the column width for each column in the model. It is called whenever TableView needs to know the width of a specific column. The function takes one argument, column, for which the TableView needs to know the width.
trans-unit.target: 该属性可以保存一个函数，该函数返回模型中每个列的列宽。每当TableView需要知道特定列的宽度时，就会调用它。该函数采用一个参数 column ，TableView需要知道该参数的宽度。

trans-unit.source: This property can hold a function that returns the column width for each column in the model. When assigned, it is called whenever TableView needs to know the width of a specific column. The function takes one argument, column, for which the TableView needs to know the width.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以包含一个函数，该函数返回模型中每个列的列宽。分配后，只要TableView需要知道特定列的宽度，就会调用它。该函数采用一个参数 column ，TableView需要知道该参数的宽度。

trans-unit.source: This property can hold a function that returns the row height for each row in the model. It is called whenever TableView needs to know the height of a specific row. The function takes one argument, row, for which the TableView needs to know the height.
trans-unit.target: 该属性可以保存一个函数，该函数返回模型中每一行的行高。每当TableView需要知道特定行的高度时，都会调用它。该函数采用一个参数 row ，TableView需要知道该参数的高度。

trans-unit.source: This property can hold a function that returns the row height for each row in the model. When assigned, it will be called whenever TableView needs to know the height of a specific row. The function takes one argument, row, for which the TableView needs to know the height.
trans-unit.target: 该属性可以包含一个函数，该函数返回模型中每一行的行高。分配后，只要TableView需要知道特定行的高度，就会调用它。该函数采用一个参数 row ，TableView需要知道该参数的高度。

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set to a valid QDate object describing a date on which the current maximumTime property makes a valid QDateTime object. The latest date that setMaximumDate() accepts is the end of 9999 CE. This is the default for this property. This default can be restored with clearMaximumDateTime().
trans-unit.target: 此属性只能设置为有效QDATE描述在其当前的日期对象maximumTime特性使得一个有效QDateTime对象。setMaximumDate（）接受的最晚日期是9999 CE的结尾。这是此属性的默认值。可以使用clearMaximumDateTime（）恢复该默认值。

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set to a valid QDate object describing a date on which the current minimumTime property makes a valid QDateTime object. The earliest date that setMinimumDate() accepts is the start of 100 CE. The default for this property is September 14, 1752 CE. This default can be restored with clearMinimumDateTime().
trans-unit.target: 此属性只能设置为有效QDATE描述在其当前的日期对象minimumTime特性使得一个有效QDateTime对象。setMinimumDate（）接受的最早日期是100 CE的开始。此属性的默认值为1752年9月14日。可以使用clearMinimumDateTime（）恢复此默认值。

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set to a valid QDateTime value. The earliest date-time that setMinimumDateTime() accepts is the start of 100 CE. The property's default is the start of September 14, 1752 CE. This default can be restored with clearMinimumDateTime().
trans-unit.target: 此属性只能设置为有效的QDateTime值。setMinimumDateTime（）接受的最早日期时间是100 CE的开始。该属性的默认值为1752年9月14日开始。可以使用clearMinimumDateTime（）恢复此默认值。

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set to a valid QDateTime value. The latest date-time that setMaximumDateTime() accepts is the end of 9999 CE. This is the default for this property. This default can be restored with clearMaximumDateTime().
trans-unit.target: 此属性只能设置为有效的QDateTime值。setMaximumDateTime（）接受的最新日期时间是9999 CE的结尾。这是此属性的默认值。可以使用clearMaximumDateTime（）恢复此默认值。

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set while the decoder is stopped. Setting this property at other times will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 此属性只能在解码器停止时设置。在其他时间设置此属性将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set directly. To change the current page, call next(), back(), or restart().
trans-unit.target: 不能直接设置此属性。要更改当前页面，请调用next（），后退（）或重新启动（）。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be turned off (i.e., set to false) if a widget's parent has a static gradient for its background.
trans-unit.target: 如果小组件的父节点的背景有静态渐变,则不能关闭此属性(即设置为 false)。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be used with rich text.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能用于富文本。

trans-unit.source: This property contains a bitmask of the shader compilation approaches supported by the Qt Quick backend the application is using.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含应用程序所使用的Qt Quick后端所支持的shader编译方法的位掩码。

trans-unit.source: This property contains a bitmask of the supported ways of providing shader sources.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含支持的提供着色器源的方式的位掩码。

trans-unit.source: This property contains a list of Inverse Bind Pose matrixes used for the skeletal animation. Each inverseBindPose matrix means the inverse of the global transform of the repective Joint::index in skeleton, which will be used initially.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含用于骨骼动画的反向绑定姿势矩阵的列表。每个inverseBindPose矩阵意味着repective的全局的逆变换联合::指数在骨架，这将在最初使用。

trans-unit.source: This property contains a list of activated languages of the virtual keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含虚拟键盘的激活语言列表。

trans-unit.source: This property contains a list of languages supported by the virtual keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含虚拟键盘支持的语言列表。

trans-unit.source: This property contains a list of materials used to render the provided geometry. To render anything, there must be at least one material. Normally there should be one material for each sub-mesh included in the source geometry.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含用于渲染所提供的几何体的材料列表。要渲染任何东西,必须至少有一个材质。通常,源几何体中的每个子网格都应该有一个材质。

trans-unit.source: This property contains a list of post-processing effects that will be applied to the entire viewport. The result of each effect is fed to the next so the order is significant.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含将应用于整个视口的后处理效果列表。每个效果的结果都会传递给下一个效果,因此顺序很重要。

trans-unit.source: This property contains a reference to a file with the preprocessed fragment shader package, typically with an extension of .qsb. The value is treated as a URL, similarly to other QML types, such as Image. It must either be a local file or use the qrc scheme to access files embedded via the Qt resource system. The URL may be absolute, or relative to the URL of the component.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含对带有预处理片段着色器包的文件的引用，该文件扩展名通常为 .qsb 。与其他QML类型（例如Image）类似，该值被视为URL。它必须是本地文件或使用qrc方案来访问通过Qt资源系统嵌入的文件。该URL可以是绝对的，也可以是相对于组件URL的相对URL。

trans-unit.source: This property contains a reference to a file with the preprocessed vertex shader package, typically with an extension of .qsb. The value is treated as a URL, similarly to other QML types, such as Image. It must either be a local file or use the qrc scheme to access files embedded via the Qt resource system. The URL may be absolute, or relative to the URL of the component.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含对具有预处理的顶点着色器包的文件的引用，该文件通常具有扩展名 .qsb 。与其他QML类型（例如Image）类似，该值被视为URL。它必须是本地文件或使用qrc方案来访问通过Qt资源系统嵌入的文件。该URL可以是绝对的，也可以是相对于组件URL的相对URL。

trans-unit.source: This property contains an ordered list of preferred plugin locales. If the first locale cannot be accommodated, then the backend falls back to using the second, and so on. By default the locales property contains the system locale.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性包含了一个有序的首选插件语言列表。如果第一个locale不能被容纳,那么后台就会回到使用第二个locale,以此类推。默认情况下,locales 属性包含系统语言。

trans-unit.source: This property contains an ordered list of preferred plugin names, which will be checked for the required features set in required before any other available plugins are checked.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含首选插件名称，将在设定所需的功能进行检查的有序列表需要检查其他任何可用的插件之前。

trans-unit.source: This property contains partial text input from an input method.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含输入法的部分文本输入。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the
trans-unit.target: 该属性包含

trans-unit.source: This property contains the current row-selection of the TableView. The selection allows you to select, deselect or iterate over selected rows.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含TableView的当前行选择。通过选择，您可以选择，取消选择或迭代选定的行。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the currently chosen key sequence.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含当前选择的密钥序列。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the default seat for this WaylandCompositor.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含此WaylandCompositor的默认位置。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the default seat for this QWaylandCompositor.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含此QWaylandCompositor的默认席位。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the edit Menu for working with text selection. Set it to null if no menu is wanted.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含用于处理文本选择的编辑菜单。如果不需要菜单，请将其设置为 null 。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the effective alternative keys presented to user.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含了呈现给用户的有效替代键。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the factor used to modify the values from the occlusionMap texture. The value should be between 0.0 to 1.0. The default is 1.0
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含用于修改occlusionMap纹理的值的因子。该值应介于0.0到1.0之间。默认值为1.0

trans-unit.source: This property contains the first in the list of outputs added to the WaylandCompositor, or null if no outputs have been added.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含添加到WaylandCompositor的输出列表中的第一个，如果未添加任何输出，则为 null。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the first in the list of outputs added to the QWaylandCompositor, or null if no outputs have been added.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含添加到QWaylandCompositor的输出列表中的第一个，如果未添加任何输出，则为 null。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the index of highlighted item in the effectiveAlternativeKeys.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含 effectiveAlternativeKeys AlternativeKeys中突出显示的项目的索引。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the keyframe groups attached to the timeline. Each keyframe group contains a list of keyframes for a specific item and property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含连接到时间轴的关键帧组。每个关键帧组包含特定项目和属性的关键帧列表。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the link string when the user hovers a link embedded in the text. The link must be in rich text or HTML format and the
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含当用户悬停嵌入文本中的链接时的链接字符串。该链接必须是富文本或HTML格式,并且是

trans-unit.source: This property contains the link string when the user hovers a link embedded in the text. The link must be in rich text or HTML format and the link string provides access to the particular link.
trans-unit.target: 当用户悬停嵌入文本中的链接时,此属性包含链接字符串。链接必须是富文本或HTML格式,链接字符串提供了对特定链接的访问。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the link string when user hovers a link embedded in the text. The link must be in rich text or HTML format and the link string provides access to the particular link.
trans-unit.target: 当用户悬停嵌入文本中的链接时,此属性包含链接字符串。链接必须是富文本或HTML格式,链接字符串提供了对特定链接的访问。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the list of NDEF records in the last NDEF message read.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含最后读取的NDEF消息中的NDEF记录列表。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the local opacity value of the Node. Since Node objects are not necessarialy visible, this value might not have any affect, but this value is inherited by all children of the Node, which might be visible.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性包含了Node的局部不透明度值。由于Node对象不是必须可见的,这个值可能没有任何影响,但这个值会被Node的所有子节点继承,这些子节点可能是可见的。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the native scan code of the key that was pressed. It is passed through from QKeyEvent unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含所按下键的本机扫描代码。它是从QKeyEvent传递的，保持不变。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the native scan code of the key that was pressed. It is passed through from QKeyEvent unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含所按下键的本机扫描代码。它是从QKeyEvent传递的，保持不变。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the number of loops remaining before the sound effect stops by itself, or SoundEffect.Infinite if that's what has been set in loops.
trans-unit.target: 该属性包含声音效果自行停止之前剩余的循环数，或者SoundEffect .Infinite（如果这是在loops中设置的），则为Infinite 。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the number of loops remaining before the sound effect stops by itself, or QSoundEffect::Infinite if that's what has been set in loops.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含声音效果自行停止之前剩余的循环数，或者QSoundEffect :: Infinite（如果这是在循环中设置的）。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the pivot values for the x, y, and z axis. These values are used as the pivot points when applying rotations to the node.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含 x、y 和 z 轴的枢轴值。当应用旋转到节点时,这些值被用作枢轴点。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the position translation in local coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含局部坐标空间的位置转换。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the rotation values for the node. These values are stored as a quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含节点的旋转值。这些值以四元数的形式存储。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the rotation values for the x, y, and z axis. These values are stored as a vector3d. Rotation order is assumed to be XYZ.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含x、y、z轴的旋转值。这些值被存储为一个矢量3d。旋转顺序假定为XYZ。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the scale values for the x, y, and z axis.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含X、Y、Z轴的刻度值。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the set of features that will be required by the Plugin object when choosing which service plugin to attach to. If the name property is set, this has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含在选择要附加到哪个服务插件时Plugin对象所需的一组功能。如果设置了name属性，则无效。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the shading language supported by the Qt Quick backend the application is using.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含应用程序所使用的Qt Quick后台支持的阴影语言。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the stack size for the thread pool worker threads.
trans-unit.target: 该属性包含线程池工作线程的栈大小。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the status of the animation clip.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含动画片段的状态。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the text in the TextField.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含TextField中的文本。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the text that is shown in the text field when the text field is empty.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含当文本字段为空时,文本字段中显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the x value of the position translation in local coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含局部坐标空间中位置转换的x值。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the y value of the position translation in local coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含局部坐标空间中位置转换的y值。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the z value of the position translation in local coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含局部坐标空间中位置转换的z值。

trans-unit.source: This property controls how fast light travels through the material.
trans-unit.target: 该属性控制了光在材料中的传播速度。

trans-unit.source: This property controls how items are elided when there is not enough space to show them for a given tab bar size.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制当给定的标签栏大小没有足够的空间显示项目时,项目如何被省略。

trans-unit.source: This property controls how paging will affect the PlaceSearchModel. If true, calling previousPage or nextPage will not reset the model, but new results will instead be appended to the model. Default is false.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制分页将如何影响PlaceSearchModel。如果为true，则调用previousPage或nextPage不会重置模型，而是将新结果附加到模型中。默认为false。

trans-unit.source: This property controls how parameters are formatted when sent with a POST request. A suitable header is also added.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性控制了用POST请求发送参数时的格式化方式。还会添加一个合适的头。

trans-unit.source: This property controls how the implicitContentWidth of the ComboBox is calculated.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制如何implicitContentWidth中的组合框计算。

trans-unit.source: This property controls how the alpha values of the sourceMask will behave.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制了 sourceMask 的 alpha 值的表现。

trans-unit.source: This property controls how the texture is mapped when the V scaling value is greater than 1.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制当 V 比例值大于 1 时如何映射纹理。

trans-unit.source: This property controls how the view scroll its contents horizontally. Scrolling can be done either per pixel or per item. Its default value comes from the style via the QStyle::SH_ItemView_ScrollMode style hint.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制视图如何水平滚动其内容。滚动可以按像素或按项目进行。其默认值来自通过QStyle :: SH_ItemView_ScrollMode样式提示的样式。

trans-unit.source: This property controls how the view scroll its contents vertically. Scrolling can be done either per pixel or per item. Its default value comes from the style via the QStyle::SH_ItemView_ScrollMode style hint.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制视图如何垂直滚动其内容。滚动可以按像素或按项目进行。其默认值来自通过QStyle :: SH_ItemView_ScrollMode样式提示的样式。

trans-unit.source: This property controls if and how the background of the scene should be cleared.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制是否以及如何清除场景的背景。

trans-unit.source: This property controls if the size of the FBO's contents should be mirrored vertically when drawing. This allows easy integration of third-party rendering code that does not follow the standard expectations.
trans-unit.target: 该属性控制在绘制时是否应该垂直镜像FBO内容的大小。这允许轻松集成不遵循标准期望的第三方渲染代码。

trans-unit.source: This property controls if the size of the FBO's texture should follow the dimensions of the QQuickFramebufferObject item. When this property is false, the FBO will be created once the first time it is displayed. If it is set to true, the FBO will be recreated every time the dimensions of the item change.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制FBO的纹理大小是否应遵循QQuickFramebufferObject项目的尺寸。如果此属性为false，则将在第一次显示FBO时创建它。如果将其设置为true，则每次项目尺寸更改时都会重新创建FBO。

trans-unit.source: This property controls if there should be a highlight around the frame when the ScrollView has input focus.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制ScrollView具有输入焦点时，框架周围是否应该有高亮显示。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the active status of the handwriting input method.
trans-unit.target: 该属性控制手写输入法的活动状态。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the amount of simulated displacement for the bumpMap or normalMap. The default value is 0 disabling the bump effect. The range is [0, 1].
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制凹凸贴图或法线贴图的模拟位移量。默认值为 0 ,禁用凹凸效果。范围是[0，1]。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the amount of simulated displacement for the normalMap.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制normalMap的模拟位移量。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the antialiasing mode that is applied when rendering the scene.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制渲染场景时应用的抗锯齿模式。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the availability status of the handwriting input method.
trans-unit.target: 该属性控制手写输入法的可用性状态。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the color format of the texture assigned in source property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制在source属性中分配的纹理的颜色格式。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the edge overlap between the handle and the increment/decrement buttons.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制手柄与增/减按钮之间的边缘重叠。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the height of an Area lights rectangle
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制区域灯矩形的高度。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the locale that this calendar uses to display itself.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制了此日历用于显示自己的地域。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the offset amount for the Material::displacmentMap.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制 Material::displacmentMap 的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the rotation of the item as it animates along the path.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制物品沿路径动画的旋转。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the scaling behaviour of the contents of the MapQuickItem. In particular, by setting this property it is possible to choose between objects that are drawn on the screen (and sized in screen pixels), and those drawn on the map surface (which change size with the zoom level of the map).
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制MapQuickItem内容的缩放行为。特别是，通过设置此属性，可以在屏幕上绘制的对象（以屏幕像素为单位）和在地图表面上绘制的对象（随地图的缩放级别而变化）之间进行选择。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the size of the area at the edge of the viewport that triggers autoscrolling. The default value is 16 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制触发自动滚动的视口边缘区域的大小。默认值为16像素。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the size of the specular highlight generated from lights, and the clarity of reflections in general. Larger values increase the roughness, softening specular highlights and blurring reflections.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制灯光产生的镜面高光的大小,以及一般反射的清晰度。值越大,粗糙度越高,镜面高光越柔和,反射越模糊。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the size of the specular highlight generated from lights, and the clarity of reflections in general. Larger values increase the roughness, softening specular highlights and blurring reflections. The range is [0.0, 1.0]. The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制灯光产生的镜面高光的大小,以及一般反射的清晰度。值越大,粗糙度越高,镜面高光越柔和,反射越模糊。范围是[0.0,1.0]。默认值为0。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the strength of specularity (highlights and reflections).
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制镜面的强度(高光和反射)。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the strength of specularity (highlights and reflections). The default value is 0 disabling the specularity. The range is [0.0, 1.0].
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制镜面反射的强度（高光和反射）。默认值为 0 ,禁用镜面反射。范围是[0.0，1.0]。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the usage of non-standard OpenGL extensions like GL_NV_path_rendering.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制非标准OpenGL扩展（例如 GL_NV_path_rendering )的使用。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the visibility of the window in the windowing system.
trans-unit.target: 该属性控制窗口系统中窗口的可见性。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the width of an Area lights rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制区域灯矩形的宽度。

trans-unit.source: This property controls what angles of reflections are affected by the fresnelPower. The default is 1.45. The value must be greater or equal to 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制fresnelPower影响哪些反射角度。默认值为 1.45 。该值必须大于或等于 1.0 。

trans-unit.source: This property controls whether or not the stream reader processes namespaces. If enabled, the reader processes namespaces, otherwise it does not.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制流读取器是否处理名称空间。如果启用,读取器将处理名字空间,否则不处理。

trans-unit.source: This property controls whether or not the stream writer automatically formats the generated XML data. If enabled, the writer automatically adds line-breaks and indentation to empty sections between elements (ignorable whitespace). The main purpose of auto-formatting is to split the data into several lines, and to increase readability for a human reader. The indentation depth can be controlled through the autoFormattingIndent property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制流编写器是否自动格式化生成的XML数据。如果启用，编写器会自动将换行符和缩进添加到元素之间的空白部分（可忽略的空白）。自动格式化的主要目的是将数据分成几行，并提高人类读者的可读性。可以通过autoFormattingIndent属性控制缩进深度。

trans-unit.source: This property controls whether the MultiPointTouchArea will handle mouse events too. If it is true (the default), the touch area will treat the mouse the same as a single touch point; if it is false, the touch area will ignore mouse events and allow them to "pass through" so that they can be handled by other items underneath.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制MultiPointTouchArea是否也将处理鼠标事件。如果为true（默认设置），则触摸区域会将鼠标视为单个触摸点；如果为假，则触摸区域将忽略鼠标事件，并允许它们“通过”，以便其下的其他项可以处理它们。

trans-unit.source: This property controls whether the Model automatically updates in response to changes in its attached RouteQuery. The default value of this property is false.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制模型是否响应其附加的RouteQuery中的更改自动更新。此属性的默认值为false。

trans-unit.source: This property controls whether the Model automatically updates in response to changes in its attached query. The default value of this property is false.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制模型是否根据其附加查询的变化自动更新。此属性的默认值为 false。

trans-unit.source: This property controls whether the first column can be moved by the user. In a QTreeView, the first column holds the tree structure and is therefore non-movable by default, even after setSectionsMovable(true).
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制用户是否可以移动第一列。在QTreeView中，第一列保留树结构，因此即使在setSectionsMovable（true）之后，默认情况下也是不可移动的。

trans-unit.source: This property controls whether the key emits key events for input method processing. When true, the key events are disabled.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制键是否为输入方法处理发出键事件。当为 "true "时,键事件被禁用。

trans-unit.source: This property controls whether the media will begin to play on start up.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制媒体是否会在启动时开始播放。

trans-unit.source: This property controls whether the model is pickable or not. By default models are not pickable and therefore not included when picking against the scene.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制模型是否可拾取。默认情况下，模型是不可拾取的，因此在场景中拾取时不包括在内。

trans-unit.source: This property controls whether the model is pickable or not. Set this property to true to make the model pickable. Models are not pickable by default.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制模型是否可拾取。将此属性设置为 true 以使模型可选取。默认情况下，无法选择模型。

trans-unit.source: This property controls whether the size of the WaylandOutput matches the size of its window.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制WaylandOutput的大小是否匹配其窗口的大小。

trans-unit.source: This property controls whether the size of the QWaylandOutput matches the size of its window.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制QWaylandOutput的大小是否与其窗口的大小匹配。

trans-unit.source: This property controls whether the user can select one or many items and, in many-item selections, whether the selection must be a continuous range of items.
trans-unit.target: 该属性控制用户是否可以选择一个或多个项目,以及在多项目选择中,选择是否必须是一个连续的项目范围。

trans-unit.source: This property controls whether this MouseArea responds to scroll gestures from non-mouse devices, such as the 2-finger flick gesture on a trackpad. If set to false, the wheel signal be emitted only when the wheel event comes from an actual mouse with a wheel, while scroll gesture events will pass through to any other Item that will handle them. For example, the user might perform a flick gesture while the cursor is over an item containing a MouseArea, intending to interact with a Flickable which is underneath. Setting this property to false will allow the PinchArea to handle the mouse wheel or the pinch gesture, while the Flickable handles the flick gesture.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制此MouseArea是否响应来自非鼠标设备的滚动手势，例如触控板上的两指轻弹手势。如果设置为false，则仅当wheel事件来自实际的带有滚轮的鼠标时，才会发出滚轮信号，而滚动手势事件将传递到任何其他将处理它们的Item。例如，当光标在包含MouseArea的项目上方时，用户可能会执行轻拂手势，意在与下方的Flickable进行交互。将此属性设置为false将允许PinchArea处理鼠标滚轮或捏合手势，而Flickable处理轻拂手势。

trans-unit.source: This property controls whether to automatically pan and zoom the viewport to display all map items when items are added or removed.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制在添加或删除项目时是否自动平移和缩放视口以显示所有地图项目。

trans-unit.source: This property controls which standard buttons are used by the button box.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制按钮框使用哪些标准按钮。

trans-unit.source: This property controls which standard buttons are used by the message box.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制消息框使用哪些标准按钮。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the current value displayed by the LCDNumber.
trans-unit.target: 该属性对应于LCDNumber显示的当前值。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the height held by the maximumSize property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于maximumSize属性保持的高度。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the height held by the minimumSize property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于minimumSize属性保持的高度。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the nearest integer to the current value displayed by the LCDNumber. This is the value used for hexadecimal, octal and binary modes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于 LCDNumber 显示的当前值的最接近整数。该值用于十六进制、八进制和二进制模式。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the width held by the maximumSize property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于maximumSize属性持有的宽度。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the width held by the minimumSize property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于minimumSize属性持有的宽度。

trans-unit.source: This property decreases head-on reflections (looking directly at the surface) while maintaining reflections seen at grazing angles. The default value is 0 disabling the fresnel effect.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可减少正面反射（直接看向表面），同时保持在掠射角度看到的反射。默认值为 0 禁用菲涅耳效果。

trans-unit.source: This property defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值为 "true"。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a Item to be used as the source of the texture. Using this property allows any 2D Qt Quick content to be used as a texture source by renderind that item as an offscreen layer.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了一个项目作为纹理的来源。使用该属性可以让任何2D Qt Quick内容作为纹理源,将该项目渲染为离屏层。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a Item to be used as the source of the texture. Using this property allows any 2D Qt Quick content to be used as a texture source by rendering that item as an offscreen layer.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了一个要用作纹理源的项目。使用此属性可以让任何2D Qt Quick内容作为纹理源,将该项目渲染为离屏层。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a RGB Texture to modulate the amount and the color of specularity across the surface of the material. These values are multiplied by the specularAmount.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义RGB纹理，以调制整个材料表面的镜面反射量和颜色。这些值乘以specularAmount。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a RGB image used to simulate fine geometry displacement across the surface of the material. The RGB channels indicate XYZ normal deviations. The amount of the effect is controlled by the bumpAmount property.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了RGB图像，该图像用于模拟材料表面上的精细几何位移。RGB通道指示XYZ法向偏差。效果的数量由bumpAmount属性控制。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a Texture for overriding or setting an image based lighting Texture for use with this material only.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了一个纹理,用于覆盖或设置基于图像的光照纹理,仅用于此材质。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a Texture for overriding or setting an image based lighting Texture for use with this material.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了一个纹理,用于覆盖或设置基于图像的光照纹理,供此材质使用。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a Texture to apply to the material. Using Texture with transparency will also apply the alpha channel as an opacity map.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了要应用于材质的 Texture。使用具有透明度的 Texture 也会将 alpha 通道作为不透明度贴图应用。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a Texture to control the specular roughness of the material.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了一个Texture来控制材料的镜面粗糙度。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a Texture to control the specular roughness of the material. If the texture contains multiple channels(RGBA), then the correct channel can be set using the roughnessChannel property.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了“纹理”以控制材料的镜面粗糙度。如果纹理包含多个通道（RGBA），则可以使用粗糙度通道属性设置正确的通道。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a Texture used to control the opacity differently for different parts of the material.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了一个纹理,用于控制材料不同部分的不透明度。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a baked lightmap Texture containing direct lighting information for this material.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了一个烘焙的光照图Texture,其中包含此材质的直接光照信息。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a baked lightmap Texture containing indirect lighting information for this material.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了一个包含此材质间接照明信息的烘焙光照图纹理。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a baked lightmap Texture containing shadowing information for this material.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了包含此材质阴影信息的烘焙光照图纹理。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a color used to adjust the specular reflections. Use white for no effect
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了用于调整镜面反射的颜色。使用白色则没有效果

trans-unit.source: This property defines a custom projection matrix.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了自定义投影矩阵。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a cutoff distance preventing objects from exhibiting ambient occlusion at close distances. Higher values increase the distance required between objects before ambient occlusion is seen.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了一个防止物体在近距离出现环境遮挡的截止距离。数值越大,物体之间的距离越大,才会出现环境遮挡。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a delegate to draw a header.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了一个绘制页眉的委托。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a delegate to draw a row.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了一个绘制行的委托。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a delegate to draw a specific cell.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了一个绘制特定单元格的委托。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a delegate to draw the branch indicator.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了一个绘制分支指示器的委托。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a grayscale Texture controlling how much light can pass through the material from behind.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了一个灰度纹理,控制了从后面通过材料的光量。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a grayscale Texture to simulate fine geometry displacement across the surface of the material. Brighter pixels indicate raised regions. The amount of the effect is controlled by the bumpAmount property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了灰度纹理，以模拟整个材料表面上的精细几何位移。较亮的像素表示凸起的区域。效果的数量由bumpAmount属性控制。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a texture used to determine how much indirect light the different areas of the material should receive. Values are expected to be linear from 0.0 to 1.0, where 0.0 means no indirect lighting and 1.0 means the effect of the indirect lighting is left unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了一种纹理,用于确定材料的不同区域应该接受多少间接光照。数值预计为0.0至1.0的线性,其中0.0表示没有间接照明,1.0表示间接照明的效果保持不变。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a threshold value for the mask pixels. The mask pixels that have an alpha value below this property are used to completely mask away the corresponding pixels from the source item. The mask pixels that have a higher alpha value are used to alphablend the source item to the display.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了遮罩像素的阈值。低于此属性的遮罩像素用于完全遮挡源项目的相应像素。遮罩像素的阿尔法值较高时,用于将源项目字母化。

trans-unit.source: This property defines ambient occlusion quality (more shades of gray) at the expense of performance.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了环境遮挡质量(更多的灰度),而牺牲了性能。

trans-unit.source: This property defines an RGB image used to simulate fine geometry displacement across the surface of the material. The RGB channels indicate XYZ normal deviations.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了一个 RGB 图像,用于模拟整个材料表面的精细几何位移。RGB通道表示XYZ法向偏差。

trans-unit.source: This property defines an image (preferably a high-dynamic range image) to use to light the scene, either instead of or in addition to standard lights. If selected, note that this image will be used as the environment for any custom materials, instead of the environment map often associated with them.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了用于照亮场景的图像(最好是高动态范围图像),可以代替标准灯光,也可以作为标准灯光的补充。如果选中,请注意,此图像将被用作任何自定义材质的环境,而不是通常与之相关联的环境地图。

trans-unit.source: This property defines an overall multiplier for this light’s effects. The default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义此灯光效果的总体倍增器。预设值是1。

trans-unit.source: This property defines an overall multiplier for this light’s effects. The default value is 100.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义此灯光效果的总体倍增器。默认值为100。

trans-unit.source: This property defines grayscale image used to offset the vertices of geometry across the surface of the material. Brighter pixels indicate raised regions.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了用于在材料表面偏移几何体顶点的灰度图像。较亮的像素表示凸起的区域。

trans-unit.source: This property defines how colors are tonemapped before rendering. All rendering in Qt Quick 3D is performed in linear color space and can in many cases lead to generating color values that are not displayable. The tonemapMode determines the technique that is used to remap colors into a displayable range.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了在渲染前如何对颜色进行色调映射。Qt Quick 3D 中的所有渲染都是在线性色彩空间中进行的,在许多情况下会导致生成无法显示的颜色值。tonemapMode 决定了用于将颜色重映射到可显示范围的技术。

trans-unit.source: This property defines how items are selected when using the RubberBandDrag drag mode.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义使用RubberBandDrag拖动模式时如何选择项目。

trans-unit.source: This property defines how joins between two connected lines are drawn. The default value is ShapePath.BevelJoin.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义如何绘制两条连接的线之间的连接。默认值为 ShapePath.BevelJoin 。

trans-unit.source: This property defines how large part of the glow color is strengthened near the source edges.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了源边缘附近的辉光颜色被强化的程度。

trans-unit.source: This property defines how large part of the shadow color is strengthened near the source edges.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了影子颜色在源边缘附近被加强的程度。

trans-unit.source: This property defines how many pixels outside the item area are reached by the glow.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了物品区域外的辉光达到多少像素。

trans-unit.source: This property defines how many samples are taken per pixel when blur calculation is done. Larger value produces better quality, but is slower to render.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了在进行模糊计算时,每个像素的采样数。值越大,质量越好,但渲染速度越慢。

trans-unit.source: This property defines how many samples are taken per pixel when edge softening blur calculation is done. Larger value produces better quality, but is slower to render.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了在进行边缘软化模糊计算时,每个像素取多少个样本。值越大,质量越好,但渲染速度越慢。

trans-unit.source: This property defines how much of the base color contributes to the specular reflections.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了基色对镜面反射的贡献程度。

trans-unit.source: This property defines how much the mouse cursor should be moved along the y axis to trigger a quick selection during a normal QLineEdit text selection.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义在常规QLineEdit文本选择期间，鼠标光标应沿y轴移动多少以触发快速选择。

trans-unit.source: This property defines how much the source brightness is increased or decreased.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了源亮度增加或减少的程度。

trans-unit.source: This property defines how much the source colors are desaturated.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了源颜色的去饱和度。

trans-unit.source: This property defines how much the source contrast is increased or decreased. The decrease of the contrast is linear, but the increase is applied with a non-linear curve to allow very high contrast adjustment at the high end of the value range.
