trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了源对比度增加或减少的程度。对比度的降低是线性的,但增加则采用非线性曲线,以允许在值范围的高端进行非常高的对比度调整。

trans-unit.source: This property defines how much the source lightness value is increased or decreased.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了源亮度值增加或减少的程度。

trans-unit.source: This property defines how opaque the QVirtualKeyboardTrace is.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义QVirtualKeyboardTrace的不透明度。

trans-unit.source: This property defines how opaque the Trace is.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了跟踪的不透明程度。

trans-unit.source: This property defines how the end points of lines are drawn. The default value is ShapePath.SquareCap.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义线的端点的绘制方式。默认值为 ShapePath.SquareCap 。

trans-unit.source: This property defines how the generated OpenGL texture should be mirrored. The default value is ShaderEffectSource.MirrorVertically. Custom mirroring can be useful if the generated texture is directly accessed by custom shaders, such as those specified by ShaderEffect. If no effect is specified for the layered item, mirroring has no effect on the UI representation of the item.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义如何镜像生成的OpenGL纹理。默认值为 ShaderEffectSource.MirrorVertically 。如果生成的纹理直接由自定义着色器（如ShaderEffect指定的着色器）访问，则自定义镜像会很有用。如果没有为分层项目指定效果，则镜像对项目的UI表示无效。

trans-unit.source: This property defines how the generated OpenGL texture should be mirrored. The default value is ShaderEffectSource.MirrorVertically. Custom mirroring can be useful if the generated texture is directly accessed by custom shaders, such as those specified by ShaderEffect. Mirroring has no effect on the UI representation of the ShaderEffectSource item itself.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义如何镜像生成的OpenGL纹理。默认值为 ShaderEffectSource.MirrorVertically 。如果生成的纹理直接由自定义着色器（如ShaderEffect指定的着色器）访问，则自定义镜像会很有用。镜像对ShaderEffectSource项本身的UI表示没有影响。

trans-unit.source: This property defines how the generated texture should be mirrored. The default value is ShaderEffectSource.MirrorVertically. Custom mirroring can be useful if the generated texture is directly accessed by custom shaders, such as those specified by ShaderEffect. If no effect is specified for the layered item, mirroring has no effect on the UI representation of the item.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义如何镜像生成的纹理。默认值为 ShaderEffectSource.MirrorVertically 。如果生成的纹理直接由诸如ShaderEffect指定的自定义着色器访问，则自定义镜像会很有用。如果没有为分层项目指定效果，则镜像对项目的UI表示没有影响。

trans-unit.source: This property defines how to scale the U texture coordinate when mapping to a mesh's UV coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了当映射到网格的 UV 坐标时如何缩放 U 纹理坐标。

trans-unit.source: This property defines how to scale the V texture coordinate when mapping to a mesh's UV coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了当映射到网格的 UV 坐标时如何缩放 V 纹理坐标。

trans-unit.source: This property defines roughly how far ambient occlusion shadows spread away from objects. Greater distances cause increasing impact to performance.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了环境遮挡阴影离物体的大致传播距离。距离越远,对性能的影响越大。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the CustomCamera's projection matrix.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义CustomCamera的投影矩阵。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the OpenGL wrap modes associated with the texture. Modifying this property makes most sense when the
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了与纹理相关的 OpenGL 包裹模式。修改此属性在以下情况下最有意义

trans-unit.source: This property defines the OpenGL wrap modes associated with the texture. Modifying this property makes most sense when the item is used as a source texture of a ShaderEffect.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义与纹理关联的OpenGL环绕模式。当将该项目用作ShaderEffect的源纹理时，修改此属性最有意义。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the RGBA color value which is used for the glow.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了用于发光的 RGBA 颜色值。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the RGBA color value which is used for the shadow.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了用于阴影的 RGBA 颜色值。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the RGBA color value which is used to colorize the source.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了用于给源着色的 RGBA 颜色值。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the amount of ambient occulusion applied. Ambient occulusion is a form of approximated global illumination which causes non-directional self-shadowing where objects are close together. A value of 100 causes full darkness shadows; lower values cause the shadowing to appear lighter. A value of 0 disables ambient occlusion entirely, improving performance at a cost to the visual realism of 3D objects rendered in the scene.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性定义了环境光的数量。环境遮挡是一种近似全局照明的形式,在物体距离很近的情况下会产生非定向的自阴影。值为100时,会产生完全黑暗的阴影;值越低,阴影就越浅。值为0则完全禁用环境遮挡,提高了性能,但代价是降低了场景中渲染的3D物体的视觉真实度。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the amount of blur iterations that are going to be performed for the source. When the property changes, the iterative blurring process starts. If the value is decreased or if the value changes from zero to non-zero, a snapshot is taken from the source. The snapshot is used as a starting point for the process.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了要对源进行的模糊迭代量。当该属性改变时,迭代模糊过程开始。如果该值减少,或者该值从零变为非零,则会从源中获取快照。该快照被用作流程的起点。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the amount of falloff for the translucency based on the angle of the normals of the object to the light source.
trans-unit.target: 该属性根据物体与光源的法线角度,定义了透光率的衰减量。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the angle at which the light intensity starts to gradually diminish as it approaches coneAngle. Defined in degrees between 0 and 180. If the value is set larger than coneAngle, it'll behave as if it had the same value as coneAngle. The default value is 30.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了当光强度接近锥角时开始逐渐减小的角度。以0到180之间的度数定义。如果将值设置为大于锥角，则其行为将与锥角具有相同的值。默认值为30。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the blur behavior near the edges of the item, where the pixel blurring is affected by the pixels outside the source edges.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了项目边缘附近的模糊行为,其中像素模糊受源边缘外的像素影响。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the bottom of the frustum on the near plane, relative to its center.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了近平面上相对于中心的壳的底部。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the bottom plane of the camera view frustum.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了摄像机视角的底部平面。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the change factor for how the luminance of each pixel is altered according to the equation:
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了每个像素的亮度如何根据公式改变的变化系数。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the change factor for how the value of each pixel color channel is altered according to the equation:
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了根据公式改变每个像素颜色通道值的变化系数。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the color applied to models illuminated by this light. The default value is white, rgb(255, 255, 255).
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了应用于被此光照亮的模型的颜色。默认值为白色,rgb(255,255,255)。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the corner radius that is used to draw a glow with rounded corners.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了用于绘制圆角辉光的角半径。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the current signal connection status. It will be true when the signalName of the target is connected successfully, otherwise it will be false.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义当前信号连接状态。当这将是真正的signalName的的目标成功连接，否则会是假的。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the current signal connection status. It will be true when the signalName of the target is connected successfully, otherwise it will be false.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义当前信号连接状态。当这将是真正的signalName的的目标成功连接，否则会是假的。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the cut-off angle beyond which the light doesn't affect the scene. Defined in degrees between 0 and 180. The default value is 40.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了光线不影响场景的截止角度。定义的度数在0到180之间。默认值为40。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the dash pattern when ShapePath.strokeStyle is set to ShapePath.DashLine. The pattern must be specified as an even number of positive entries where the entries 1, 3, 5... are the dashes and 2, 4, 6... are the spaces. The pattern is specified in units of the pen's width.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义ShapePath时的破折号模式。strokeStyle设置为ShapePath .DashLine。必须将模式指定为偶数个正数条目，其中条目1、3、5 ...是破折号，而条目2、4、6 ...是空格。以笔的宽度为单位指定图案。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the default text aligment.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了默认的文本片段。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the delay, in milliseconds, after which the word candidate list is hidden if empty.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了如果候选词列表为空,则隐藏候选词列表的延迟时间,以毫秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the direction for the blur and at the same time the level of blurring. The larger the angle, the more the result becomes blurred. The quality of the blur depends on samples property. If angle value is large, more samples are needed to keep the visual quality at high level.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义模糊的方向，同时定义模糊的级别。角度越大，结果变得越模糊。模糊的质量取决于样本属性。如果角度值较大，则需要更多样本才能将视觉质量保持在较高水平。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the direction for the blur. Blur is applied to both sides of each pixel, therefore setting the direction to 0 and 180 produces the same result.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了模糊的方向。模糊应用于每个像素的两边,因此将方向设置为0和180会产生相同的结果。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the distance of neighboring pixels which influence the blurring of individual pixels. A larger radius provides better quality, but is slower to render.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了影响单个像素模糊的相邻像素的距离。半径越大,质量越好,但渲染速度越慢。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the distance of the neighboring pixels which affect the blurring of an individual pixel. A larger radius increases the blur effect.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了影响单个像素模糊的相邻像素的距离。半径越大,模糊效果越好。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the distance of the neighboring pixels which affect the blurring of an individual pixel. A larger radius increases the blur effect. FastBlur algorithm may internally reduce the accuracy of the radius in order to provide good rendering performance.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义影响单个像素模糊的相邻像素的距离。较大的半径会增加模糊效果。FastBlur算法可能会在内部降低半径的准确性，以提供良好的渲染性能。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the easing curve of the animation. By default, a linear easing curve is used, resulting in linear interpolation. Other curves are provided, for instance, QEasingCurve::InCirc, which provides a circular entry curve. Another example is QEasingCurve::InOutElastic, which provides an elastic effect on the values of the interpolated variant.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义动画的缓动曲线。默认情况下，使用线性缓动曲线，导致线性插值。提供了其他曲线，例如QEasingCurve :: InCirc，它提供了圆形的入口曲线。另一个示例是QEasingCurve :: InOutElastic，它对插值变量的值提供弹性影响。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the edge multiplier to the tessellation generator.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了棋盘生成器的边缘乘数。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the ending point where the color at gradient position of 1.0 is rendered. Colors at smaller position values are rendered linearly towards the start point. The point is given in pixels and the default value is Qt.point(0, height). Setting the default values for the start and end results in a full height linear gradient on the y-axis.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义在1.0渐变位置呈现颜色的终点。较小位置值的颜色朝着起点线性呈现。该点以像素为单位，默认值为Qt.point（0，height）。设置起点和终点的默认值会在y轴上产生全高的线性渐变。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the far clip plane of the OrthographicCamera's frustum. Geometry which is further away from the Camera than the far clip plane will not be visible.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义OrthographicCamera的平截头体的远裁剪平面。距相机比远剪辑平面更远的几何形状将不可见。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the far clip plane of the PerspectiveCamera's frustum. Geometry which is further away from the Camera than the far clip plane will not be visible.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义PerspectiveCamera的平截头体的远剪辑平面。距相机比远剪辑平面更远的几何形状将不可见。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the fill gradient. By default no gradient is enabled and the value is null. In this case the fill uses a solid color based on the value of ShapePath.fillColor.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义填充渐变。默认情况下，未启用任何渐变，其值为 null 。在这种情况下，填充使用基于ShapePath值的纯色。fillColor。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the hue value which is added to the source hue value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了加在源色调值上的色调值。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the hue value which is used to colorize the source.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了用于给源着色的色调值。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the image source field of view for the case of using a camera source as the IBL probe.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了使用相机源作为 IBL 探头时的图像源视场。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the inner multiplier to the tessellation generator.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了棋盘生成器的内部乘数。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the internal OpenGL format of the texture. Modifying this property makes most sense when the
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了纹理的内部 OpenGL 格式。修改此属性在以下情况下最有意义

trans-unit.source: This property defines the internal OpenGL format of the texture. Modifying this property makes most sense when the item is used as a source texture of a ShaderEffect. Depending on the OpenGL implementation, this property might allow you to save some texture memory.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义纹理的内部OpenGL格式。当将该项目用作ShaderEffect的源纹理时，修改此属性最有意义。根据OpenGL的实现，此属性可能允许您节省一些纹理内存。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the internal format of the texture. Modifying this property makes most sense when the
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了纹理的内部格式。修改此属性在以下情况下最有意义

trans-unit.source: This property defines the interpolation mode.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了插值模式。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the item that is controlling the final intensity of the blur. The pixel alpha channel value from maskSource defines the actual blur radius that is going to be used for blurring the corresponding source pixel.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了控制模糊的最终强度的项目。来自 maskSource 的像素 alpha 通道值定义了实际的模糊半径,它将被用于模糊相应的源像素。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the item that is going to be blended over the source.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义将要在源上混合的项目。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the item that is going to be filled with gradient. Source item gets rendered into an intermediate pixel buffer and the alpha values from the result are used to determine the gradient's pixels visibility in the display. The default value for source is undefined and in that case whole effect area is filled with gradient.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了要被填充渐变的项目。源项被渲染到一个中间像素缓冲区,结果中的alpha值被用来决定渐变的像素在显示中的可见度。源项的默认值是未定义的,在这种情况下,整个效果区都被渐变填充。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the item that is going to be used as the displacement map. The displacementSource item gets rendered into the intermediate pixel buffer. The red and green component values from the result determine the displacement of the pixels from the source item.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性定义了将被用作位移图的项目。displacementSource项会被渲染到中间像素缓冲区中。结果中的红色和绿色分量值决定了像素从源项目的位移。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the item that is going to be used as the mask. Mask item gets rendered into an intermediate pixel buffer and the alpha values from the result are used to determine the source item's pixels visibility in the display.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了将被用作遮罩的项目。遮罩项被渲染到中间像素缓冲区,结果的alpha值被用来决定源项在显示中的像素可见度。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the item that is going to be used as the mask. The mask item gets rendered into an intermediate pixel buffer and the alpha values from the result are used to determine the source item's pixels visibility in the display.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了将被用作遮罩的项目。遮罩项被渲染到一个中间像素缓冲区,结果的alpha值被用来决定源项在显示中的像素可见度。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the left plane of the camera view frustum.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了摄像机视图的左平面。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the left side of the frustum on the near plane, relative to its center.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了近平面上相对于中心的甲壳的左侧。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the lightness value which is added to the source saturation value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了加在源饱和度值上的亮度值。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the location of the mesh file containing the geometry of this Model or one of the built-in primitive meshes listed below as described in Mesh format and built-in primitives.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义包含此Model的几何或下面列出的内置基本网格之一的网格文件的位置，如网格格式和内置基本元素所述。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the maximum input level for each color channel. It sets the white-point, all pixels having higher value than this property are rendered as white (per color channel). Decreasing the value lightens the light areas.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了每个颜色通道的最大输入电平。它设置了白点,所有高于此属性值的像素都被渲染为白色(每个颜色通道)。降低该值可使亮区变亮。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the maximum output level for each color channel. Decreasing the value darkens the light areas, reducing the contrast.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了每个颜色通道的最大输出电平。降低该值会使亮部变暗,降低对比度。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the maximum perceived amount of movement for each pixel. The amount is smaller near the center and reaches the specified value at the edges.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了每个像素的最大感知移动量。该量在中心附近较小,在边缘达到指定值。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the mesh used to draw the ShaderEffect. It can hold any GridMesh object. If a size value is assigned to this property, the ShaderEffect implicitly uses a GridMesh with the value as mesh resolution. By default, this property is the size 1x1.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义用于绘制ShaderEffect的网格。它可以容纳任何GridMesh对象。如果将大小值分配给此属性，则ShaderEffect隐式使用GridMesh并将该值作为网格分辨率。默认情况下，此属性的大小为1x1。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the minimum input level for each color channel. It sets the black-point, all pixels having lower value than this property are rendered as black (per color channel). Increasing the value darkens the dark areas.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了每个颜色通道的最小输入电平。它设置了黑点,所有低于此属性值的像素都被渲染为黑色(每个颜色通道)。增加该值会使暗区变暗。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the minimum output level for each color channel. Increasing the value lightens the dark areas, reducing the contrast.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了每个颜色通道的最小输出电平。增加该值可使暗区变亮,降低对比度。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the mode which is used when foregroundSource is blended over source. Values are case insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了将前台源混合到源上时使用的模式。值不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the name of the signal on target to listen for.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义目标上要侦听的信号的名称。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the name of the signal on target to listen for.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义目标上要侦听的信号的名称。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the name of the test case for result reporting. The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了用于结果报告的测试用例的名称。默认值为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the near clip plane of the OrthographicCamera's frustum. Geometry which is closer to the Camera than the near clip plane will not be visible.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义OrthographicCamera的视锥的近剪切平面。比近裁剪平面更靠近相机的几何将不可见。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the near clip plane of the PerspectiveCamera's frustum. Geometry which is closer to the Camera than the near clip plane will not be visible.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义PerspectiveCamera的平截头体的近剪辑平面。比近裁剪平面更靠近相机的几何将不可见。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the number of times that signalName has been emitted from target since the last call to clear().
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义自上次调用clear（）以来从目标发出signalName的次数。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the number of times that signalName has been emitted from target since the last call to clear().
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义自上次调用clear（）以来从目标发出signalName的次数。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the order that items in the playlist are played.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了播放列表中项目的播放顺序。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the perceived amount of movement for each pixel. The movement is divided evenly to both sides of each pixel.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了每个像素的感知移动量。移动量被平均分配到每个像素的两侧。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the rectangular area of the item that should be rendered into the texture. The source rectangle can be larger than the item itself. If the rectangle is null, which is the default, then the whole item is rendered to the texture.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了应渲染到纹理中的项目的矩形区域。源矩形可以比项目本身大。如果矩形为空,即默认值,那么整个项目都会被渲染到纹理中。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the reference node of the scene to render to the viewport. The node does not have to be a child of the View3D. This referenced node becomes a sibling with child nodes of View3D, if there are any.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义要渲染到视口的场景的参考节点。该节点不必是View3D的子级。如果有，此引用的节点将与View3D的子节点成为同级节点。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the reference node of the scene to render to the viewport. The node does not have to be a child of the View3D. This referenced node becomes sibling with possible child nodes of View3D.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义要渲染到视口的场景的参考节点。该节点不必是View3D的子级。该引用的节点与View3D的可能子节点成为同级。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the rendering function.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了渲染功能。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the replace content to be used in conjunction with columnRolePattern. Defaults to empty string. For more information on how the search and replace using regular expressions works, see QString::replace(const QRegExp &rx, const QString &after) function documentation.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义要与columnRolePattern结合使用的替换内容。默认为空字符串。有关如何使用正则表达式进行搜索和替换的更多信息，请参见QString :: replace（const QRegExp＆rx，const QString＆after）函数文档。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the replace content to be used in conjunction with rotationRolePattern. Defaults to empty string. For more information on how the search and replace using regular expressions works, see QString::replace(const QRegExp &rx, const QString &after) function documentation.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义要与rotationRolePattern结合使用的替换内容。默认为空字符串。有关如何使用正则表达式进行搜索和替换的更多信息，请参见QString :: replace（const QRegExp＆rx，const QString＆after）函数文档。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the replace content to be used in conjunction with rowRolePattern. Defaults to empty string. For more information on how the search and replace using regular expressions works, see QString::replace(const QRegExp &rx, const QString &after) function documentation.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义要与rowRolePattern结合使用的替换内容。默认为空字符串。有关如何使用正则表达式进行搜索和替换的更多信息，请参见QString :: replace（const QRegExp＆rx，const QString＆after）函数文档。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the replace content to be used in conjunction with valueRolePattern. Defaults to empty string. For more information on how the search and replace using regular expressions works, see QString::replace(const QRegExp &rx, const QString &after) function documentation.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义要与valueRolePattern一起使用的替换内容。默认为空字符串。有关如何使用正则表达式进行搜索和替换的更多信息，请参见QString :: replace（const QRegExp＆rx，const QString＆after）函数文档。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the replace content to be used in conjunction with rotationRolePattern. Defaults to an empty string. For more information on how the search and replace using regular expressions works, see QString::replace(const QRegExp &rx, const QString &after) function documentation.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义要与rotationRolePattern结合使用的替换内容。默认为空字符串。有关如何使用正则表达式进行搜索和替换的更多信息，请参见QString :: replace（const QRegExp＆rx，const QString＆after）函数文档。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the replace content to be used in conjunction with xPosRolePattern. Defaults to an empty string. For more information on how the search and replace using regular expressions works, see QString::replace(const QRegExp &rx, const QString &after) function documentation.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义要与xPosRolePattern结合使用的替换内容。默认为空字符串。有关如何使用正则表达式进行搜索和替换的更多信息，请参见QString :: replace（const QRegExp＆rx，const QString＆after）函数文档。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the replace content to be used in conjunction with yPosRolePattern. Defaults to an empty string. For more information on how the search and replace using regular expressions works, see QString::replace(const QRegExp &rx, const QString &after) function documentation.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义要与yPosRolePattern结合使用的替换内容。默认为空字符串。有关如何使用正则表达式进行搜索和替换的更多信息，请参见QString :: replace（const QRegExp＆rx，const QString＆after）函数文档。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the replace content to be used in conjunction with zPosRolePattern. Defaults to an empty string. For more information on how the search and replace using regular expressions works, see QString::replace(const QRegExp &rx, const QString &after) function documentation.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义与zPosRolePattern结合使用的替换内容。默认为空字符串。有关如何使用正则表达式进行搜索和替换的更多信息，请参见QString :: replace（const QRegExp＆rx，const QString＆after）函数文档。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the right plane of the camera view frustum.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了摄像机视角的右平面。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the right side of the frustum on the near plane, relative to its center.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性定义了近平面上相对于中心的甲壳的右侧。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the rotation of the gradient around its center point. The rotation is only visible when the horizontalRadius and verticalRadius properties are not equal. The angle is given in degrees and the default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义渐变围绕其中心点的旋转。仅当horizo​​ntalRadius和verticalRadius属性不相等时，旋转才可见。角度以度为单位，默认值为 0 。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the saturation value value which is added to the source saturation value.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了加到源饱和度值上的饱和度值。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the saturation value which is used to colorize the source.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了用于给源着色的饱和度值。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the scale for the displacement. The bigger scale, the bigger the displacement of the pixels. The value set to 0.0 causes no displacement.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了位移的比例。比例尺越大,像素的位移越大。设置为0.0的值不会产生位移。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the smoothness of the mask edges near the threshold alpha value. Setting spread to 0.0 uses mask normally with the specified threshold. Setting higher spread values softens the transition from the transparent mask pixels towards opaque mask pixels by adding interpolated values between them.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义接近阈值 alpha值的遮罩边缘的平滑度。将散布设置为0.0时，通常使用具有指定阈值的遮罩。设置较高的扩展值可以通过在透明蒙版像素之间添加内插值来软化从透明蒙版像素到不透明蒙版像素的过渡。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the source item for the pixels that are going to be displaced according to the data from displacementSource.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义为要根据来自数据被移位的像素中的源项displacementSource。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the source item for which the luminance is going to be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了要调整亮度的源项目。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the source item that is going to be blurred.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了要进行模糊处理的源项目。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the source item that is going to be masked.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了要被屏蔽的源项目。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the source item that is going to be the base when foregroundSource is blended over it.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了将frontSource混合时将作为基础的源项目。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the source item that is going to be used as source for the generated glow.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了将被用作生成辉光的源项。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the source item that is going to be used as the source for the generated shadow.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了将被用作生成阴影的源项。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the source item that provides the source pixels for the effect.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了为效果提供源像素的源项。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the source item that provides the source pixels to the effect.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了为效果提供源像素的源项。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the start angle for the conical gradient. The value is in degrees (0-360).
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了锥形梯度的起始角度。值的单位是度(0-360)。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the starting angle where the color at the gradient position of 0.0 is rendered. Colors at larger position values are rendered into larger angle values and blended seamlessly. Angle values increase clockwise.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了渐变位置为 0.0 的颜色的起始角度。位置值较大的颜色会渲染成较大的角度值,并无缝混合。角度值顺时针增加。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the starting point on the dash pattern, measured in units used to specify the dash pattern.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了破折号图案的起点,以指定破折号图案的单位为单位。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the starting point where the color at gradient position of 0.0 is rendered. Colors at larger position values are rendered linearly towards the end point. The point is given in pixels and the default value is Qt.point(0, 0). Setting the default values for the start and end results in a full height linear gradient on the y-axis.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义渲染渐变位置0.0处的颜色的起点。较大位置值处的颜色朝着端点线性呈现。该点以像素为单位给出，默认值为Qt.point（0，0）。设置起点和终点的默认值会在y轴上产生全高的线性渐变。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the static flags that are used to evaluate how the node is rendered. Currently doesn't do anything but act as a placeholder for a future implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了用于评估节点渲染方式的静态标志。目前不做任何事情,只是作为未来实现的占位符。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the style of all tool buttons that are added as QActions. Note that if you add a QToolButton with the addWidget() method, it will not get this button style.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义所有作为QAction添加的工具按钮的样式。请注意，如果使用addWidget（）方法添加QToolButton，它将不会获得此按钮样式。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the style of stroking. The default value is ShapePath.SolidLine.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义描边的样式。默认值为ShapePath .SolidLine。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the target QObject for this animation.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义此动画的目标QObject。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the target object that will be used to listen for emissions of the signalName signal.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义将用于侦听signalName信号发射的目标对象。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the target object that will be used to listen for emissions of the signalName signal.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义将用于侦听signalName信号发射的目标对象。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the target property name for this animation. The property name is required for the animation to operate.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了此动画的目标属性名。该属性名是动画操作所需的。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the text that is shown above the menu when there is no current menu item (currentIndex is -1).
trans-unit.target: 当没有当前菜单项（currentIndex为 -1 ）时，此属性定义在菜单上方显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the texture channel used to read the metalness value from metalnessMap. The default value is Material.B.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义用于从metalnessMap读取金属度值的纹理通道。默认值为 Material.B 。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the texture channel used to read the occlusion value from occlusionMap. The default value is Material.R.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义用于从occlusionMap读取遮挡值的纹理通道。默认值为 Material.R 。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the texture channel used to read the opacity value from opacityMap. The default value is Material.A.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义用于从opacityMap读取不透明度值的纹理通道。默认值为 Material.A 。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the texture channel used to read the opacity value from opacityMap. The default value is Material.A.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义用于从opacityMap读取不透明度值的纹理通道。默认值为 Material.A 。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the texture channel used to read the roughness value from roughnessMap. The default value is Material.R.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义用于从粗糙度映射读取粗糙度值的纹理通道。默认值为 Material.R 。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the texture channel used to read the roughness value from roughnessMap. The default value is Material.G.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义用于从粗糙度映射读取粗糙度值的纹理通道。默认值为 Material.G 。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the texture channel used to read the translucency value from translucencyMap. The default value is Material.A.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义用于从translucencyMap读取半透明值的纹理通道。默认值为 Material.A 。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the texture used to set the base color of the material.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了用于设置材质基础颜色的纹理。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the top of the frustum on the near plane, relative to its center.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性定义了近平面上相对于中心的壳的顶部。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the top plane of the camera view frustum.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了摄像机视图的顶面。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the vertices of the polyline.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性定义了多段线的顶点。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the vertices of the polylines.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性定义了多段线的顶点。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the wrap modes associated with the texture. Modifying this property makes most sense when the
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了与纹理相关的包覆模式。修改此属性在以下情况下最有意义

trans-unit.source: This property defines what method to use to dynamically generate additional geometry for the model. Tessellation is useful if you are using a displacement map with your geometry, or if you wish to generate a smoother silhouette when zooming in.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了使用什么方法为模型动态生成附加几何体。如果您在几何体上使用了位移图,或者您希望在放大时生成一个更平滑的轮廓,那么镶嵌是很有用的。

trans-unit.source: This property defines what should happen when the user clicks on the scene background and drags the mouse (e.g., scrolling the viewport contents using a pointing hand cursor, or selecting multiple items with a rubber band). The default value, NoDrag, does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了当用户单击场景背景并拖动鼠标时（例如，使用手形光标滚动视口内容，或使用橡皮筋选择多个项目）时应该发生的情况。默认值NoDrag不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: This property defines whether culling is enabled and which mode is actually enabled.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了是否启用了剔除功能以及实际启用了哪种模式。

trans-unit.source: This property defines whether primitive culling is enabled, and, when enabled, which primitives are discarded.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了是否启用基元剔除,以及启用后会丢弃哪些基元。

trans-unit.source: This property defines whether the Trace can accept more data. If the value is true, no more data is accepted.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义跟踪是否可以接受更多数据。如果该值为 true ，则不再接受任何数据。

trans-unit.source: This property defines whether the Trace is canceled. The input data should not be processed from the Traces whose canceled property set to true.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义是否取消跟踪。不应从 canceled 属性设置为true 的跟踪中处理输入数据。

trans-unit.source: This property defines whether the word candidate list should always remain visible.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了候选词列表是否应始终保持可见。

trans-unit.source: This property defines whether this geo shape is empty.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了此地理形状是否为空。

trans-unit.source: This property defines which color will be used to clear the viewport when using SceneEnvironment.Color for the backgroundMode property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义在将 SceneEnvironment.Color 用作backgroundMode属性时将使用哪种颜色来清除视口。

trans-unit.source: This property defines which lighting method is used when generating this material.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了生成此材料时使用的照明方法。

trans-unit.source: This property defines which method of mapping to use when sampling this texture.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了在对此纹理进行取样时要使用的贴图方法。

trans-unit.source: This property defines which rectangular area of the sourceItem to render into the texture. The source rectangle can be larger than sourceItem itself. If the rectangle is null, which is the default, the whole sourceItem is rendered to texture.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义将sourceItem的哪个矩形区域渲染到纹理中。源矩形可以大于sourceItem本身。如果矩形为null（默认值），则整个sourceItem都会呈现为纹理。

trans-unit.source: This property defines which render target the QPainter renders into, it can be either QQuickPaintedItem::Image, QQuickPaintedItem::FramebufferObject or QQuickPaintedItem::InvertedYFramebufferObject.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义QPainter渲染到的渲染目标，它可以是QQuickPaintedItem :: Image，QQuickPaintedItem :: FramebufferObject或QQuickPaintedItem :: InvertedYFramebufferObject。

trans-unit.source: This property defines which sides of the item should be visible.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了项目的哪些面应该是可见的。

trans-unit.source: This property defines which units are used for measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了测量时使用的单位。

trans-unit.source: This property describes how strongly the target is pulled towards the source. The default value is 0 (that is, the spring-like motion is disabled).
trans-unit.target: 此属性描述了目标物被拉向源头的力度。默认值为 0(即禁用类似弹簧的运动)。

trans-unit.source: This property describes how to repeat or stretch the middle parts of an image.
trans-unit.target: 此属性描述如何重复或拉伸图像的中间部分。

trans-unit.source: This property describes how to repeat or stretch the middle parts of the border image.
trans-unit.target: 该属性描述了如何重复或拉伸边界图像的中间部分。

trans-unit.source: This property describes the animation's current time. You can change the current time by calling setCurrentTime, or you can call start() and let the animation run, setting the current time automatically as the animation progresses.
trans-unit.target: 此属性描述动画的当前时间。您可以通过调用setCurrentTime来更改当前时间，也可以调用start（）并让动画运行，并随着动画的进行自动设置当前时间。

trans-unit.source: This property describes the control's requested font. The font is used by the control's style when rendering standard components, and is available as a means to ensure that custom controls can maintain consistency with the native platform's native look and feel. It's common that different platforms, or different styles, define different fonts for an application.
trans-unit.target: 此属性描述了控件的请求字体。在渲染标准组件时,控件的样式会使用该字体,该字体可用于确保自定义控件能够与本地平台的本地外观和感觉保持一致。不同的平台,或者不同的风格,为一个应用程序定义不同的字体是很常见的。

trans-unit.source: This property describes the control's requested palette. The palette is used by the control's style when rendering standard components, and is available as a means to ensure that custom controls can maintain consistency with the native platform's native look and feel. It's common that different platforms, or different styles, define different palettes for an application.
trans-unit.target: 此属性描述了控件的请求调色板。调色板是控件的样式在渲染标准组件时使用的,它是确保自定义控件与原生平台的原生外观和感觉保持一致的一种手段。不同的平台,或者不同的风格,为一个应用程序定义不同的调色板是很常见的。

trans-unit.source: This property describes the current loop of the animation. By default, the animation's loop count is 1, and so the current loop will always be 0. If the loop count is 2 and the animation runs past its duration, it will automatically rewind and restart at current time 0, and current loop 1, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性描述了动画的当前循环。默认情况下,动画的循环次数为1,所以当前循环次数永远为0,如果循环次数为2,动画运行超过了持续时间,就会自动倒带,在当前时间0重新开始,当前循环次数为1,以此类推。

trans-unit.source: This property describes the current state of the animation. When the animation state changes, QAbstractAnimation emits the stateChanged() signal.
trans-unit.target: 此属性描述动画的当前状态。当动画状态改变时，QAbstractAnimation发出stateChanged（）信号。

trans-unit.source: This property describes the current value; an interpolated value between the start value and the end value, using the current time for progress. The value itself is obtained from interpolated(), which is called repeatedly as the animation is running.
trans-unit.target: 此属性描述当前值；使用当前进展时间在起始值和结束值之间插入的值。该值本身是从插值（）获得的，该值在动画运行时被反复调用。

trans-unit.source: This property describes the duration in milliseconds of the animation. The default duration is 250 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 此属性描述了动画的持续时间,单位为毫秒。默认持续时间为 250 毫秒。

trans-unit.source: This property describes the end value of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 该属性描述了动画的结束值。

trans-unit.source: This property describes the graphics API that is currently in use.
trans-unit.target: 此属性描述了当前正在使用的图形 API。

trans-unit.source: This property describes the item's requested palette. The palette is used by the item's style when rendering all controls, and is available as a means to ensure that custom controls can maintain consistency with the native platform's native look and feel. It's common that different platforms, or different styles, define different palettes for an application.
trans-unit.target: 此属性描述了项的请求调色板。当渲染所有控件时,该调色板被项目的样式所使用,它是一种确保自定义控件能够与本地平台的本地外观和感觉保持一致的手段。不同的平台,或者不同的风格,为一个应用程序定义不同的调色板是很常见的。

trans-unit.source: This property describes the loop count of the animation as an integer. By default this value is 1, indicating that the animation should run once only, and then stop. By changing it you can let the animation loop several times. With a value of 0, the animation will not run at all, and with a value of -1, the animation will loop forever until stopped. It is not supported to have loop on an animation that has an undefined duration. It will only run once.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用整数描述动画的循环次数。默认情况下,这个值是1,表示动画应该只运行一次,然后停止。通过改变它,您可以让动画循环多次。值为0时,动画将完全不运行,值为-1时,动画将永远循环,直到停止。不支持对一个未定义持续时间的动画进行循环。它只会运行一次。

trans-unit.source: This property describes the optional start value of the animation. If omitted, or if a null QVariant is assigned as the start value, the animation will use the current position of the end when the animation is started.
trans-unit.target: 此属性描述动画的可选起始值。如果省略，或者将空QVariant分配为起始值，则动画将在开始动画时使用结束的当前位置。

trans-unit.source: This property describes the optional start value of the animation. If omitted, or if a null QVariant is assigned as the start value, the animation will use the current position of the end when the animation is started.
trans-unit.target: 此属性描述动画的可选起始值。如果省略，或者将空QVariant指定为起始值，则动画将在开始动画时使用结束的当前位置。

trans-unit.source: This property describes the portion of the attached QWaylandBuffer that should be drawn on the screen. The coordinates are from the corner of the buffer and are scaled by bufferScale.
trans-unit.target: 此属性描述应在屏幕上绘制的附加QWaylandBuffer的部分。坐标从缓冲区的一角开始，并由bufferScale缩放。

trans-unit.source: This property describes the portion of the attached Wayland buffer that should be drawn on the screen. The coordinates are from the corner of the buffer and are scaled by bufferScale.
trans-unit.target: 此属性描述应在屏幕上绘制的附加Wayland缓冲区的一部分。坐标从缓冲区的一角开始，并由bufferScale缩放。

trans-unit.source: This property describes the status of image loading. It can be one of:
trans-unit.target: 此属性描述图像加载的状态。它可以是以下几种状态之一:

trans-unit.source: This property describes the widget's palette. The palette is used by the widget's style when rendering standard components, and is available as a means to ensure that custom widgets can maintain consistency with the native platform's look and feel. It's common that different platforms, or different styles, have different palettes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性描述了小组件的调色板。渲染标准组件时,小组件的样式会使用该调色板,该调色板可用于确保自定义小组件与本地平台的外观和感觉保持一致。不同的平台,或者不同的风格,有不同的调色板是很常见的。

trans-unit.source: This property describes the widget's requested font. The font is used by the widget's style when rendering standard components, and is available as a means to ensure that custom widgets can maintain consistency with the native platform's look and feel. It's common that different platforms, or different styles, define different fonts for an application.
trans-unit.target: 此属性描述了小组件的请求字体。渲染标准组件时,小组件的样式会使用该字体,该字体可用于确保自定义小组件与本地平台的外观和感觉保持一致。不同的平台或不同的风格为应用程序定义不同的字体是很常见的。

trans-unit.source: This property describes whether the tumbler is currently moving, due to the user either dragging or flicking it.
trans-unit.target: 该属性描述了滚轮是否在移动,由于用户拖动或轻弹滚轮。

trans-unit.source: This property describes whether the user can interact with the SwipeView. The user cannot swipe a view that is not interactive.
trans-unit.target: 此属性描述用户是否可以与SwipeView进行交互。用户无法滑动非交互式视图。

trans-unit.source: This property describes whether the user can interact with the Flickable. A user cannot drag or flick a Flickable that is not interactive.
trans-unit.target: 此属性描述了用户是否可以与Flickable交互。用户不能拖动或弹动一个没有交互功能的Flickable。

trans-unit.source: This property determines how dark the cast shadows should be. The value range is [0, 100], where 0 mean no shadows and 100 means the light is fully shadowed. The default value is 5.
trans-unit.target: 此属性决定了投射的阴影应该有多暗。值的范围是 [0,100],其中 0 表示没有阴影,100 表示完全投射阴影。默认值为5。

trans-unit.source: This property determines how dark the cast shadows should be. The value range is [0, 100], where 0 means no shadows and 100 means the light is fully shadowed. The default value is 5.
trans-unit.target: 此属性决定了投射的阴影应该有多暗。值的范围是 [0,100],其中 0 表示没有阴影,100 表示完全投射阴影。默认值为5。

trans-unit.source: This property determines how the icon and text are displayed within the button.
trans-unit.target: 此属性确定图标和文本在按钮内的显示方式。

trans-unit.source: This property determines how the View3D is combined with the other parts of the Qt Quick scene.
trans-unit.target: 此属性确定View3D如何与Qt Quick场景的其他部分组合。

trans-unit.source: This property determines how the colors of the model rendered blend with those behind it.
trans-unit.target: 此属性决定了渲染的模型的颜色如何与后面的颜色混合。

trans-unit.source: This property determines how the colors of the model rendered blends with those behind it.
trans-unit.target: 此属性决定了渲染的模型的颜色如何与后面的颜色混合。
